reviews.text:
[[VIDEOID:a4c303c922bf2cd6817ff5005f70e858]] Ok. It comes with the forms that are very curved. A brush and spatula, top and base coat, and the colors..: oh and a nail filer.
The consistency of the colors is very thick is hard to squeeze it out of the jar... which for me makes difficult to work with it so if you constantly wet your brush with alcohol it gets way way better!

reviews.product_name: 3 Barrel Curling Iron, Milantia 3/4 Inch Mini Travel Curling Wand Hair for Small Curly, Dual Voltage Ceramic Tourmaline 19mm Crimper Hair Iron for Women - Fast Heating, Portable
reviews.title: Very mini
reviews.text:
[[VIDEOID:21ddac411e00668aac7eceb5ed24668f]] Nice little machine. It doesn’t come with styling ideas or anything so I don’t know if it can do something other than crimp hair. Anyways this style of wave is the closest to my natural hair without styling so It takes like 35 minutes to finish my hair.
It’s very easy to use and comes only with on and off button, you cannot set the heat.

reviews.product_name: Yolife Acrylic Nail Brush with100% Pure Kolinsky Sable, Nail Art Brush With Brilliant crystal Handle, for Manicure Pedicure (6#, Silver)
reviews.title: Cute
reviews.text: Nice and cute. These are versatile and handy for manicure and they are as cute as you seem them on sellers description. Nice for the price!

reviews.product_name: ROSEGIN 23 Pcs Gel Nail Polish Set with Glossy and Matte Top and Base Coat Soak Off Gel Polish Colors Pink Red Green Neon Long Lasting Nail Gel Polish
reviews.title: Gorgeous colors
reviews.text: Very pretty colors! Vivid and bright!! This Is a nice value for money. You get beautiful fashion shades at a decent price! Is also perfect for a gift.

reviews.product_name: UNNY CLUB Cover Glow Cushion 0.3 Oz / 11g Beige Color SPF50+, Flawless Gloss Cushion Powder Complex Single Layer Concealer Cover Moisture Essence Tight Fit, Korea Cosmetics (No.21 Light Beige)
reviews.title: Very light
reviews.text: There is not too many shades to choose. For me it is a bit too light but ai can make it work. Is very lightweight and does not leave skin feeling oily nor cakey.

reviews.product_name: STYLEAGAL Portable Electric Nail Drill, Manicure Pedicure Drill Kit Professional nail starter kit for beginners acrylic with drill（2020 Upgraded）
reviews.title: Beginner approved
reviews.text:
I’m new to trying to do my own nails.
I really like all the accessories that came in this budget friendly kit. It worked great for my beginner skills.

reviews.product_name: Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces.
reviews.title: Love these
reviews.text: These hair ties are too pretty to be hair ties, my daughter actually uses them more as bracelets because their too pretty. She loves the little "pearls" on them. She has worn them in her hair though and she has long semi-thick hair and they work great holding her hair up and together.

reviews.product_name: Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Conditioner to Grow, Thicken, Moisturize and Protect Your Beard, 8.5 oz.
reviews.title: so so
reviews.text: This conditioner goes in smooth and washes out good, but my beard doesn't feel any smoother than it did beforehand, it is actually drying out my husbands beard.

reviews.product_name: Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Shampoo with Natural Essential Oils for Moisturizing Skin & Hair, 8.5 oz.
reviews.title: so so
reviews.text: This shampoo smells good, lathers good, and washes out good, but its actually drying my beard out. I even used it with the duo conditioner, & it just isn't for me.

reviews.product_name: Acrylic Nail Powder Set Vcedas 24 Colors Acrylic Nail Art Tips UV Gel Carving Powder Dust Design Decoration 3D Manicure
reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.text: These colors are so pretty. The packaging was nice. The glitter works as expected and looks so nice on the nails. Also, the containers are decent size so this should last me for a very long time

reviews.product_name: Canple Self-cleaning Slicker Brush for Medium Long Hair Types Dog and Cat, Removes Loose Hair Undercoat Effectively Reduce Mats & Tanglings Grooming Brush
reviews.title: for dogs
reviews.text: I'd recommend more for dogs than for cats, because the brush is big, which is understandably intimidating to my cat.

reviews.product_name: Caudalie Favorites Set
reviews.title: Great travel sized set filled with your Caudalie staples
reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Caudalie products, especially their grape water spray. That was the product that got me to explore the entire Caudalie line. This is a great set of 5 different staple items to try (face wash, serum, spray, eye cream, and moisturizer), especially if you are new to Caudalie products. Also great for anyone who already love and use some of these items on a daily basis but need a mini version to bring with them on a short trip - nobody wants to lug around tubes of full sized skin care products when you only need a few drops on that short trip!

reviews.product_name: Travel Friendly Face Cleanser, Quick Cleansing Dry Tissue 20 Packs - Dry Facial Wipes Makeup Remover Travel Size, Exfoliating Wipes For Face
reviews.title: makes a great travel cleanser!
reviews.text: I am saving some of these for my next weekend getaway as they are super lightweight and I’ll have one less bulky product to bring (facial cleanser). My night time face routine usually consists of step one, using makeup remover wipes to get rid of all the makeup, and step two, washing everything off with a facial cleanser. These do a good job doing the second round of cleaning my face. Overall this is a great product for washing your face (no makeup).

reviews.product_name: Laloirelle Deep Hydration Face Oil - Nourishing Helichrysum Oil, Avocado Oil Infused With Red Ginseng, Shitake Mushroom, Elderflower - Unparalleled For Moisturizing Very Dry, Dull or Aging Skin - 1.0 fl oz
reviews.title: I love this face oil!
reviews.text: I just love the smell of this one - especially when the smells are from oils / essential oils, and nothing synthetic. This bottle is just chock full of good stuff, good ingredients, and herbs and things. As we get into the winter season this will be perfect to keep my skin moisturized so at the moment I am using it sparingly. After trying this face oil I am excited to explore other products from Laloirelle because their formulation and ingredients used are exactly the type of stuff I love and trust to use on my skin.

reviews.product_name: Gentlehomme Face Moisturizer For Men - Mens Facial Lotion with Neroli Essential Oil Scent - Collagen & Stem Cells - Daily Anti-Aging Moisturizer for Dry & Oily Skin - 4 oz
reviews.title: a face cream for use in the colder seasons
reviews.text:
I like that this product uses oils like jojoba, cocoa, and coconut. It is a little on the oily side but the thing is now that the colder/fall/winter season is coming, this is the perfect face cream for the season. The scent was light and pleasant, but that always comes down to personal preference as some people are very sensitive to smell.

It says this cream has collagen and stem cells, but I’m not sure how much of those ingredients are used in the formulation. It would be nice to know because if there is too little then there is probably very little anti wrinkle benefits.

reviews.product_name: Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz
reviews.title: nice bottle of shower gel for guest bathroom
reviews.text: I know scents are a personal thing and can be a hit or miss for most people. I didn’t mind the vanilla musk scent at all and thought it was pleasant. I already have plenty of shower gels I need to use up in my own shower so I am putting this in our guest bathroom, especially since the bottle has a nice floral design. My only complaint is this is a Korean product but they should have also included a list of ingredients in English in case it was a gift and the recipient needed to make sure they were not allergic to anything used in this shower gel.

reviews.product_name: Busy Co. Biodegradable Hydrating Hand Wipes, With Collagen and Peptides to Smooth and Improve Elasticity, 15 Individually Wrapped Wipes (Refresh Line - Fresh Citrus)
reviews.title: great quality sanitizing wipes
reviews.text: These wipes are great for when you are out and not want to lug around a huge bottle of hand sanitizer in your bag. They don’t really smell like alcohol or anything overwhelming at all, which I was surprised with. This would be a good wipe to bring with you to a restaurant where you can use it on your hands first then wipe down the table. I like this wipes but they can get a little pricey in comparison to pump gel/liquid sanitizers (per use).

reviews.product_name: Revitalizing N.M.F Intensive Hydrating Serum that treats Dull, Tired, Dry and Sensitive Skin from Manilla Natural Skincare
reviews.title: loving this serum!
reviews.text: I just love the scent of this serum! Others are saying they smell vanilla but for some reason it smells like honey to me and I just love the scent. It did not feel sticky or tacky at all. I really enjoyed using this serum at night before bed and letting it work its magic. Now that we are in colder weather my skin needs a thicker face cream like oils/serum so this is just perfect. I plan to use this every night because the scent just soothes and relaxes me. I can’t wait to try the other products in their line!

reviews.product_name: PINROSE Perfumes Bold Soul - Eau de Parfum Petals (Fragrance Towelettes) - Vegan, Cruelty-free, and Hypoallergenic Scent with Essential Oils - Notes of Crushed Blackberry, Tuberose, Vanilla, Cinnamon and Patchouli
reviews.title: no more lugging around a heavy bottle of perfume / body spray
reviews.text: Prior to these I had been carrying wet wipes in my bag for when I’m out and need a little refreshing / wipe down sweaty body parts. The wet wipes are not scented and I did not want to carry a bottle of perfume or scented spray with me because those are too heavy and bulky. These perfume wipes are the perfect solution for me. What I’ll do is I wipe myself down with wet wipes first then I’ll swipe these on my neck and wrists. These are so convenient! These would also be great for weekend getaways where you’ll have one less heavy thing (perfume bottle) to pack.

reviews.product_name: Avajar Blue LED Hydrating Cream Mask 5 Pack - Hydrating Face Masks for Women | Moisturizing Face Mask for Girls | Collagen Face Sheet Masks Set | Korean Face Mask Sheets Pack | Sheet Mask For Face
reviews.title: Loving this product! It’s white, not blue, so don’t worry!
reviews.text: The mask is soaked in serum and had a little extra left which I scooped out and piled onto the mask on my face. The material of the mask is soft. I was able to massage the rest of the serum into my skin and sort of wiped off some of the excess. When I opened the package it was your standard white mask, white serum. It was a little confusing to me with the image of the blue cream in the front and the mention of a blue powder on the back of the packaging. Just know that this mask just looks like your typical face mask, soaked in white serum!

reviews.product_name: Bath Body Brush with Super Comfy Bristles for Universal Skin,Long Bamboo Handle Gentle Exfoliation Improve Skin's Health and Beauty Wet or Dry Brushing Back Scrubber for Shower
reviews.title: So soft, dense bristles
reviews.text: These bristles are SO soft! These will definitely not make you feel like you are scraping a layer of your skin off like most brushes do. This lathers very well which is great when I am trying to get my back. This brush is really so soft that I can use it on my baby as well. The wood handles are quite sturdy. Very good quality, dense brush.

reviews.product_name: GENSKIN Generation Skin Hydrating Marine Algae Eye Patches | Hydrate, Plump, Brighten Eye Area 180g/6.34 Oz - 30 pairs
reviews.title: Patches break easily
reviews.text: Having previously been disappointed with another one of their product (spilled and dried out), I was half expecting this product to arrive the same way. While this one did not arrive dried out, it was disappointing to see the eye patches were not drenched in the solution like most eye patches I’ve tried. I usually wear my glasses when I am using eye patches at night and have never experienced any that tore during use but these did. It tore near/underneath my eyeglass nose pad, which I had not touched with my fingers. Overall these just did not leave a good impression on me.

reviews.product_name: QTMY Fashion Rhinestone Flower Headband,Wide Hair Hoop for Women,Hair Accessories Head Band Headwear,White
reviews.title: Beautiful headband
reviews.text: Beautiful headband, very well made. I haven’t worn a headband in years but they sort of had a comeback recently, like the scrunchie, so I wanted to have one to coordinate with my outfits. I love the color combination - the white and the colorful jewels. The floral jewels are very well made and gorgeous. It feels comfortable on my head, and stays put. This headband just ties my entire outfit together. Love it!

reviews.product_name: FASCY LAB GREEN+ Korean Sunscreen — SPF 50+PA++++, Daily Facial Sunscreen, Sun Cream With Patented Ingredients, Korean Spf, Korean Sun Cream for Face — Paraben Free [1 x 1.69 Fl.Oz.]
reviews.title: Facial sunscreen without the icky-ness
reviews.text: For the longest time my facial “sunscreen” was just to avoid the sun, stay in the shade. That is still my mantra, but occasionally when I know I’ll be in the sun I put on a good Asian sunscreen - because they tend to uncheck all the boxes of the things I mentioned above. It did not feel uncomfortable on my skin and did not leave any white cast or blotches. It absorbed pretty quickly and my skin didn’t feel tacky. All in all, this is another Asian facial sunscreen that I am adding to my “loves” list.

reviews.product_name: BeautyStat Mini Universal Essentials Skin Care Kit - 3 in 1: Universal C Skin Refiner + Universal Pro Bio Moisture Boost Cream + Universal Moisture Essence | Created by a Veteran Cosmetic Chemist
reviews.title: I don’t do silicones (and petrolatum)
reviews.text: My favorite is the moisture essence with 100% plant based squalane. It doesn’t have any offensive scents and odors, and I like the way it makes my skin feel. However, the other two, Skin Refiner and Moisture Boost, I am not sold on because of the ingredients. When I first used the skin refiner I loved how it felt - goes on smoothly, glides through my skin, and melts into it like butter. The skin refiner also made my skin itchy and tingly, even though I tried on three separate occasions, so I had to stop using it. The good thing about these products is they are fragrance free.

reviews.product_name: HASK CUCUMBER + ALOE Body Wash 2 Pack- Refreshing, vegan formula, hypoallergenic, dermatologist tested, pH balanced- 2 Pack of 24.5 oz Bottles
reviews.title: smells nice, thick, creamy body wash
reviews.text: This is a pretty good sized bottle of body wash that will last quite a while! It has.a thick, creamy consistency - not at all watered down, which I appreciate! It feels nice on the skin, lathers well, and gives me skin a good clean. I got the cucumber aloe one, it smells nice. I've seen this brand around but never tried it until now. I'm glad I did. It is a good body wash and great value, especially this two pack one. I plan to try the lavender/vanilla combo and shea/cocoa butter combo next. Good stuff!

reviews.product_name: BeautyStat Cosmetics Universal Moisture Essence, 100% Pure Squalane, Face Oil, Moisturizer, 30ml, 1oz
reviews.title: my (only) favorite BeautyStat product
reviews.text: I've heard a lot of good things about this brand but I personally wasn't a fan of their other products. That said, this product is my favorite from BeautyStat. I loved how it felt on my skin, and although it is a "face oil", did not leave my skin a greasy mess. My skin soaked it up soon after applying and just made it feel nice and moist. It feels very gentle and I did not experience any itchiness or irritation. There is no scent to this, and is just 100% pure Squalane.

reviews.product_name: AAVRANI Travel Discovery Skin Care Set with Exfoliating Cleanser & Facial Mask, Toning Serum, Softening Day & Night Moisturizer & Eye Cream Treatment, Facial Kit for Glowing Skin & Healthy Complexion
reviews.title: loving ayurvedic skincare
reviews.text: The exfoliator has little shea nut powder beads in it to help exfoliate and scrub, and has a thick consistency. It is just as luxurious as the full sized products. I have been loving a lot of these ayurvedic based skincare brands as they seem to use better, cleaner, and gentler ingredients. I am saving this set to bring with me on weekend getaways.

reviews.product_name: Sand & Sky Face Roller & Massager Tool. Aussie Skincare Essentials Firming Face Roller, Sculpt, Sooth & Contour to Banish Puffiness and Boost Serum Absorption.
reviews.title: great quality roller, feels really nice, de-puffed my face
reviews.text: I don't like a lot of facial massagers but LOVED this one. First of all, it is gorgeous with the pink ombre on silver. It has a good weight to it and is easy to grasp. The angle makes it so that when you are rolling it almost creates a pinching effect. It also feels cool on the face, with or without any lotion/serum. You can make it even cooler by storing it in the fridge prior to use. I also had some tightness in my neck area and it worked great as a massager too. Very good quality roller, this is one I highly recommend!

reviews.product_name: Fragrantshare Makeup Brushes Professional Organizer Foundation Brush for Liquid makeup Travel 9Pcs Sets - Odorless Fiber Hair - Light Blue
reviews.title: amazed at the quality, design, and packaging of this brush set
reviews.text: I prefer a clean, sanitized brush over a fancy box that I’ll end up throwing away. I guess I'm not a makeup brush snob or a professional makeup artist so I just don't understand paying that much for a makeup brush. I thought these were great quality, the bristles are so soft, the color scheme is beautiful, and I love the plain matte handles. I thought the size of the brush is just right, good density - bottom line is I have no complaints about these!

reviews.product_name: NIRA Skincare Laser & Serum Bundle - Includes Anti-Aging Laser & Hyaluronic Acid Serum - Reduces Appearance of Fine Lines & Wrinkles - FDA Cleared
reviews.title: you will see results if you commit to it
reviews.text: I noticed a tightening of the areas I used the laser on for the past 3 months. I really liked the hyaluronic acid serum that was included in the set - the serum felt gentle and has no smell (fragrance free). The laser is easy to operate and charge (usb). It isn't painful, but you feel a little zap. I would equate it to the same level of "pain" as a derma roller, that spikey/zappy feeling - not painful, not super uncomfortable. Nira is the first at home laser product that I decided to give a chance to, as I trust it.

reviews.product_name: Girlz Squad Foot Spa Sets for Girls Ages 7-12 with Nail Kit for Kids - DIY Manicure and Pedicure Set with Foot Care Kit Perfect for Sleepovers and Slumber Party. Helps Develop Self-Care and Creativity
reviews.title: hours of fun
reviews.text: The foot spa uses batteries so I was able to do this anywhere and not have to worry about being close to an outlet. We always have plenty of batteries at home anyway for our gadgets so it wasn't an issue. The foot spa machine itself is pretty cool, and is almost like the one I have for myself. I did use warm water - the machine doesn't heat up or anything, so make sure you use lukewarm water for the little feets! The great thing about this is that it is a suitable item for a wide range of ages, even after they've entered their teen years.

reviews.product_name: Travel Bottles for Toiletries, Silicone Travel Size Bottles And Squeezable Containers Holders with belt clip Keychain for Backpack, Shampoo, Liquid, Cosmetic Products(2 oz, 6 Pack)
reviews.title: BEWARE! Scent Leaks!
reviews.text:
I am very happy when I got this one coz it looks super nice and made of quality material. I got it mainly for holding hand sanitizers for my whole family but the scent leaks so bad that I have to not use it for the purpose. It is also not good when squeezing coz it will not give you little amount.
* some liquid leaks too.

This product will be good for lotion, toothpaste or shampoo/conditioner coz they have thicker consistency. But be aware that scents leaks.

reviews.product_name: Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm, Facial Kit with Microneedle and Pink Jade Rollers
reviews.title: Love how it feels on my face
reviews.text:
I use to use the micro needle to my face and love the effects but mine got older and glad I find this set.
PROS
* nice set to gift to your friend/family
* micro needles are sharp and easy to roll on my face
* i love that the micro needle roller is packed in a sterilized bag
* easy to hold and glide on my face
* the pink jade roller rolls softly on my face. The smaller roller feels perfect on my eye areas.

reviews.product_name: Birthday Gift, Yachyee hair removal device
reviews.title: Relaxing indeed!
reviews.text:
This is a nice gift set! The letterings are good and no smudges. The lid closes nicely and the straw fits perfectly. My only wish is the bottom of the tumbler have nonskid bottom but even without this stays in place without issues.
The soap, bath bombs and the candle smells really good and doesn’t irritate my skin and nose.
The wine topper and the key is cheap looking but I guess it’s the thought that counts.
It maybe a bit pricey, but the convenience it gives you pays for it.

reviews.product_name: Girlz Squad Foot Spa Sets for Girls Ages 7-12 with Nail Kit for Kids - DIY Manicure and Pedicure Set with Foot Care Kit Perfect for Sleepovers and Slumber Party. Helps Develop Self-Care and Creativity
reviews.title: Battery Operated! Fun but limited!
reviews.text:
The product is good and is fun to use with my niece when I have them with me.
The foot spa is easy to operate and makes your little girl feel extra special.
The items that comes with it is cute BUT the slippers are super thin/flimsy and slippery so be very careful if you plan to use them around wet areas/tile floors.
This uses a battery and will cost you more than the unit over time, if you use the rechargeable kind then you may not be able to use it longer (spa time wise)
Overall the product is good and exactly as described!

reviews.product_name: Beautiful Girl You Can Do Amazing Things, Inspirational Gifts for Women, Christmas Gifts, Amazing Gifts for Teen Girls, Beautiful Gift Makeup Bag, Inspirational Jewelry Dish, Amazing Mirror
reviews.title: Love how clear the mirror is!
reviews.text: This looks exactly as advertised and my favorite is the mirror!

reviews.product_name: Automatic Curling Iron, Rechargeable Cordless Hair Curler with LCD Digital Display and 6 Temperature Settings, Fast Heating Portable Automatic Hair Curler for Styling Hair Anytime ( Pink )
reviews.title: Battery drained fast
reviews.text: This is a nice portable automatic curling iron.

reviews.product_name: Nail Clipper Set, GIDIBII Luxury 18 in 1 Stainless Steel Nail Clipper Kit, Manicure Pedicure Care Tools with Portable Travel Case
reviews.title: It works for Me!
reviews.text:
It has Nail Clippers that I’ve never seen before but, I think they work really well to get in at angles that I just can’t do with regular ones. I wish the Case that comes with it could be hung up for storage but, I love all of the different tools in it and know that when I feel the next ingrown nail is coming, I will be able to get to it Much easier to avoid it from getting bad.
I would definitely recommend it for the price it is.
Stay Healthy Everyone!😁

reviews.product_name: RUGGED & DAPPER Active Regimen Grooming and Skincare Set for Men | Includes Body Wash Shampoo + Face Wash + Facial Moisturizer + Shaving Cream in a Travel Bag
reviews.title: Very Nice!
reviews.text:
This Set comes looking pretty classy in its packaging. It also comes with its own matching black tote and the handle on it makes it easy to carry or hang it for storage, which is exactly what I’ve done. I’ve never heard of this company but, I don’t know much about current fashion names anyway so, that’s not saying much.😁
I can easily say that I think the scents are really nice, not too strong for my senses and it’s definitely something I would appreciate as a gift with Class.
Stay Healthy Everyone!😁

reviews.product_name: Purple Hair Mask for Blonde with Keratin & Jojoba Oil - Platinum & Silver Hair - Instantly Eliminate Brassiness & Yellows - Made in USA - Hair Toner - Bleached & Highlighted Hair - Sulfate Free - 8 oz
reviews.title: It Helps!
reviews.text:
This really helps to keep the blonde alive. Just massage it in an leave it for about 10 minutes and rinse. It also leaves my hair and scalp feeling nice and soft. I’ve already used this type of Conditioner and Shampoo, so this is a good boost on top of those.
I think it’s well worth trying and I’m glad I did.
Stay Healthy Everyone!🤪

reviews.product_name: DeepDream Portable Electric Nail Drill - Professional Efile Nail Drill Kit For Acrylic, Gel Nails, Manicure Pedicure Polishing Shape Tools with 11Pcs Nail Drill Bits and 36 Sanding Bands
reviews.title: Works Great!
reviews.text:
I thought it was a wireless model but, for it not being one, it’s quite a bit thinner than one with a battery in it and it’s lightweight. It’s made of metal and it comes with a decent amount of different grinding tips and sander roles. The control is simple, works well and it’s powerful enough to to a good job. I’d definitely recommend it.
Stay Healthy Everyone!😁

reviews.product_name: 1513 by LA LA LEAF - All Natural Facial Cream, 750mg Quick Absorbing Hemp Moisturizer with Rosehip, Carrot Seed and Provitamin B5 - Smooths Wrinkles for Firm Glowing Skin - Paraben-free, Cruelty-free, Vegan
reviews.title: Good for my Neck!
reviews.text:
I don’t think I could use it consistently on my face but, this helps my often super dry Neck to look healthier and more youthful. I’ve used a little bit in the morning and at night and it’s helping. It’s thick enough but, it spreads out quite easily.
It’s alsoPublish their Lab Testing for its quality and Guarantee it.
Enjoy!😁

reviews.product_name: Glass spray bottle-16 ounce empty bottle ounce refillable container 2 packs, suitable for essential oils, cleaning products, aromatherapy, water mist plants with mist and air flow settings
reviews.title: Good quality!
reviews.text: These arrived quickly and in perfect order. The sprayers work well and the set comes with 2 nice Caps to fully seal them, if needed and even a little Funnel to make a clean fill. I think they’re pretty decent and would definitely recommend.

reviews.product_name: Makeup Blender Sponge Set - 4 Pack Latex Free Q-Soft Makeup Beauty Foundation Blending Sponge Flawless Smooth Brush for Liquid Foundation BB Creams Powders Concealer (4 Pack)
reviews.title: Kind of firm but good shapes
reviews.text: I'm not a complete beauty sponge snob and I've tried lots of different brands, both high-end and budget friendly, and I found sponges I liked at both price points. These sponges are definitely on the farmer side, so for that reason they aren't my favorite. They do expand when wet and I really do like the shape of the larger ones in this set--they are very similar to the Real Techniques sponges--but they're just not as soft and bouncy as some of the others that I prefer. If you're looking for a good drugstore-priced sponge I recommend the Loreal ones.

reviews.product_name: RAREKIND Fade Matte Lipstick by Amorepacific - 10 Colors, Cruelty-Free Nourishing Lip Stick, Velvety-smooth, Long-Lasting Moisturizing Lipstick - 3.2g Maple Road
reviews.title: Super comfortable, long wearing, and fades beautifully
reviews.text: This is so beautiful! I love the packaging and the color was really rich and a beautiful tone on my skin. Oftentimes reds can be too warm or too cool and this is just the right amount of warmth for me. It's very comfortable to wear and was nice and long wearing without being drying. and then I was really pleased with how beautifully it faded after a very long time. I'm excited to try different shades in this formula.

reviews.product_name: Claw Hair Clips, IKOCO 6 Pack Jaw Clips Stylish Matte Plastic Strong Hold Hair Clamps Box Packaged for Thin Fine Hair with 10Pcs Black Hair ties (2.4Inch)
reviews.title: Sturdy and great if you have a lot of hair
reviews.text: These are much larger in person than I was expecting but they're perfect if you have a lot of hair or long hair or you want to be able to clip a bun securely on your head. They feel like they are quite sturdy as well. I always break my clips and I think I'm going to have a hard time breaking these. I also appreciate the included hair ties!

reviews.product_name: 3 Barrel Curling Iron, Milantia 3/4 Inch Mini Travel Curling Wand Hair for Small Curly, Dual Voltage Ceramic Tourmaline 19mm Crimper Hair Iron for Women - Fast Heating, Portable
reviews.title: Is this a curling wand for dolls? So tiny!
reviews.text: The product images for this curling wand are deeply misleading. It shows the curling iron on a model's hair and it looks like an average sized curling wand with three barrels. No, in person this thing is so tiny. It honestly looks like a curling iron for dolls. As you can see in my photo I'm using a pencil for scale. Each of these barrels is about a pencil and a half to two pencils big. Meaning that the type of curls you get are more like 1920s finger waves than anything you would probably want to wear today. It's just ridiculous.

reviews.product_name: 5-Pack Hair Scalp scrubber Massager Shampoo Brush for Straight Curly Long Short Thick Thin Wet Dry Hair, Men Women Kids Scalp Care Hair Cleaning Shower, Scalp Care Brush,100% comfortable
reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for in a scalp scrubber. It has a fairly comfortable to hold handle which makes this easy to hang on to and not slip out of your hands even if you have super slippery shampoo. The bristles are firm enough but very flexible so they're quite comfortable on the scalp. I also love that you get so many colors here! I was able to gift several to my family and still have one for myself.

reviews.product_name: YsesoAi 28 Pcs Hair Curlers Spiral Curls No Heat Wave Hair Curlers Styling Kit Spiral Hair Curlers Magic Hair Rollers with 2 Pieces Styling Hooks for Most Kinds of Hairstyles (20 cm/ 7.8 inches)
reviews.title: NOT spirals in any way shape or form - but did a decent job making some body in my hair
reviews.text:
More like standard old school curls.

I found them a bit hard to use as well - as I found it a big pain to get the stick through the curler. Plus even though I cut my hair to like shoulder length - these are actually pretty short - just for the ends of your hair really.

With that being said - I tried these one night after a shower - letting my hair dry by at least half. I put the curlers in while watching TV. My hair definitely had some bounce and was sort of curly. Thanks!

reviews.product_name: Glass spray bottle-16 ounce empty bottle ounce refillable container 2 packs, suitable for essential oils, cleaning products, aromatherapy, water mist plants with mist and air flow settings
reviews.title: Well made bottles - work well
reviews.text: This glass bottle set is well made and sturdy. I think they are far to pretty to use with general cleaning so instead with these pretty bottles I added some filtered water and essential oils. This way I have a natural air spray and I can also use the spray on soft surfaces too. Now my home smells fresh and lovely whenever I want to spritz. The nozzle seems to work well too as some sprayers out there just make a wet mess everywhere - these do not. So great! If you found my review helpful, why not click the "Helpful" button. Thanks!

reviews.product_name: Kneipp Shower Foam Goodbye Stress Water Mint & Rosemary 6.81 Oz
reviews.title: Feels and washes lovely - smells like MEN'S COLOGNE, though :(
reviews.text:
This wash is luxurious. The foam really is luxurious and goes a long way.

My problem is the very strong scent. In no way does it smell like mint or rosemary (two scents that I LOVE!). To me, it smells like a men's cologne. In fact it smells just like this hand wash that a male friend keeps in his bathroom. The good news is that it leaves just the lightest scent on your cleansed skin - thank goodness. : ( Sad too as I truly appreciate how it is clearly marked Vegan as that is important to me. Thanks!

reviews.product_name: Nxconsu 8Pcs Rhinestone Headbands for Women Girls Teens Kids Fashion Comfort No Hurting Hair Accessories Thin Hair Bands Crystal Exquisite Color Selection
reviews.title: Wow! Soooooo pretty!
reviews.text:
Pictures do not do these headbands justice. There was another reviewer who said how nice they looked - like Swarovski crystals - more high end. Her description was great and her photos were good - but the photos are nothing like the actual headbands. They really do look like lovely high end bands. I was surprised how nice they look on - in real life. Especially in low light situations - the crystals catch the light and look really lovely!

If you find this review helpful - why not click the "Helpful" button? Thanks!

reviews.product_name: Busy Co. Biodegradable Hydrating Hand Wipes, With Collagen and Peptides to Smooth and Improve Elasticity, 15 Individually Wrapped Wipes (Refresh Line - Fresh Citrus)
reviews.title: Wipes are nice and good for the environment
reviews.text:
I hate things that are loaded with perfume. They work well to cleanse a particular area. You can't use them for like a full body thing while camping in deep woods as you would have to use a few to get the job done.

Overall very nice for the occasional usage - ALWAYS good to have! They also left my skin feeling nice. Not drying - not oily either.

If you find this review helpful - why not click the "Helpful" button? Thanks!

reviews.product_name: Rancco Dried Flower Buds Fragrant Petals Ball, 10 Kinds Natural Organic Flowers Ball, Premium Grade Dried Blooming Flower Tea Balls for Tea, Baking or Bath Bombs
reviews.title: Sketchy...  Ingredients?  Organic my eye!  For tea? - I don't think so
reviews.text: First off for anything touting that they are Organic and then come in a non-descript bag - no ingredients, no country of origin or manufacture - no brand info, etc. It just sort of filled the entire mug with flowers - petals and flowers. Light at that and must have been chamomile as chamomile smells like chicken soup to me and I am not a fan of chamomile or this "tea". It was not fragrant in any way either so I think although you get plenty of flowers for a tub - you are defeating the purpose of adding fragrant flower petals to your bath. Plus some people are allergic to certain herbs and flowers anyway. Thanks!

reviews.product_name: Velvet Women Headband with Buttons,YANJIE 6 Pcs Hair Band Ear Protection Holder for Nurses Doctors Non Slip,Stretchy Leopard Head Bands Fashion Unisex Hair Accessories Head Wrap 20inch
reviews.title: GOOD button placement - also stays put on your head due to fabric
reviews.text: I like these mask headbands. First - the button placement is PERFECT! Some headbands have the buttons way too high to use - these are set PERFECTLY. I LOVE that  The colors are pretty nice too - especially for office wear! Not sure how often I will use the print ones - but the other colors are perfect for the office. The only thing - because the buttons are 'so nice' and sort of concave - once you stick your mask on the button sort of sticks out a bit - more so than a flat button. Some flat buttons let the mask slip off sort of easily. Thanks!

reviews.product_name: Nxconsu 12Pcs Headbands for Women Girls Teens Elastic Hair Bands Silky Solid Colors Pleated Crinkle Head Band Fashion Trendy Outfit Colorful Thin Comfortable Hair Accessories for Home Work Gym Casual
reviews.title: Very simple yet flirty
reviews.text:
These headbands are pretty nice. The ends of the bands (which are wrapped in coordinating colored cloth which is awesome!) This makes the ends of the bands - the actual edge of the cloth) poke at my ears and head when removing them. They also fit pretty well and are comfortable to wear - except for the pokey bottoms. Plus - even though the ends are uncomfortable - I LOVE that they are finished with the same exact color - most bands take the cheap way out and finish all the colors in black or something.
If you found my review helpful, why not click the "helpful" button. Thanks!

reviews.product_name: QTMY Wide Headbands Fashion Women Baroque Crystal Gemstone Hair Accessories Head Band Fashion Headwear Hairbands for Women
reviews.title: Pretty but Catches and pulls out a lot of hair
reviews.text: This blingy headband is so pretty. Makes me wonder how long it will take for the other stones to also fall out…  Usually with jewelry, it is preferable to have prong set stones but apparently not in a headband as all those prongs grab and catch like every hair available on your head. : (  Maybe if you have VERY short hair that has no way of catching…  (It also came with a freebie hair clip which I will give to a child and a sweet, cute paper origami heart - love that! Thanks!

reviews.product_name: Birthday Gift, Yachyee hair removal device
reviews.title: Decent enough box of goodies - was expecting more from it, though
reviews.text: Same goes for the bath bombs – no ingredients whatsoever. The wine tumbler seems well made and comes with a straw and straw brush. The candle says it is soy wax which is nice but to me it smells terrible. The weird part is that the gift box comes with a plastic wine topper. Now the wine bottle topper “looks” nice but it is 100% plastic – worse than dollar store... It also comes with what looks like a random decorative metal key that serves no function and does not go with the contents at all. Thanks!

reviews.product_name: Sdara Aloe Vera Gel For Face and Body - Organic & Natural, Soothing & Cooling For Sunburn Relief, Restorative For Dry Skin - Made In USA
reviews.title: Some Issues
reviews.text:
Well - Cold Pressed / Chemical free / Organic Aloe Vera sounded like a great product.
BUT after receiving it, and paying more attention to ingredients I'm sorry I requested it.

PROS
> While the Organic Aloe Vera (Cold Pressed) is what I wanted
> And Citric Acid is OK ingredient for better absorption.

CONS
> I'm at a loss why - Sodium Bicarbonate (baking Soda) is included
> Phenoxyethanol is a BIGGY to AVOID = being it scores as one of the TOP 8 HARMFUL
chemicals to avoid in skin care.
It can have harmful effects on the brain and nervous system.
> Xantham gum - another less than healthy product often included to prevent ingredients
from separating.

reviews.product_name: lorelo 4 Pieces Nail Dotting Pen, Dual-ended Nail Dotting Pen Liner Brush Nail Art Point Drill Drawing Tools Set Nail Art DIY Decoration Tool
reviews.title: Good quality / value
reviews.text:
These are good tools for nails, and any number of hobby's.
Excellent also for costume jewelry repair.

The wax end nicely picks up rhinestones to lay in place.
It's fairly soft so you don't need to press.
In-fact will press them out of shape if you do.

The stainless steel tip is the size of the head of a straight pin.
and hollow in the middle for better centering / pressing down.

5 stars

reviews.product_name: 5pcs Nail Art Liner Brushes, Lystaii Dual-ended Painting Nail Design Brush Pen Include Liner Brushes and Dotting Pen Nail Art Point Drill Drawing Brush Double Ended Dotting Tools Set 5,7,9,11,14mm
reviews.title: Good quality set.
reviews.text:
The brushes are 5 1/2" long 1/4" wide and easy hold for articulating designs.
The 5 different brushes allow for various strokes of width / depth.

The metal ends each have a different ball size tip
Perfect selection for large variety of designs.

Very attractive rhinestones centers of pens.
5 stars

reviews.product_name: Dr. Denese SkinScience Essential Lipid Anti Aging Power Infusion Dry Oil - Skin Nutrients 97% Organic 100% Natural - Rejuvinating Blend with Amaranth & Resveratrol - Paraben-Free, Cruelty-Free - 2oz
reviews.title: With a belief in the ingredients
reviews.text:
It's easy to see why it is, and expect this liquid to be / feel oily.
Of the 20 ingredients = 7 are extracts while 13 are various healthy oils.

Interestingly = though there's some flower extracts - the product doesn't
have any fragrance.

reviews.product_name: Bath Pillow for Bathtub, Spa Pillows for Neck Head Shoulders Back Support, Thick Bath Tub Cushion with 6 Suction Cups Men Women Breathable Comfort 4D Air Mesh Quick Dry Headrest Bath Accessories
reviews.title: A nice bath pillow.
reviews.text:
The 2 upper suction cups ended up needing placed where the shower surround
fake grout is = so no suction on the wall to keep it in place.
But the 4 suction cups against the tub hold it fairly well in place.

We've found the pillow to be comfortable and filled in the 2" ledge of the tub
to the wall perfectly. It's a soft / comfy / convenient cushion.
From my 'big box store' shopping from back in the day seems a good value.

reviews.product_name: Revitalizing N.M.F Intensive Hydrating Serum that treats Dull, Tired, Dry and Sensitive Skin from Manilla Natural Skincare
reviews.title: THIS may work
reviews.text:
Therefore I likely used more than may have been needed.
Gotta be aware to not go quickly through the bottle.

Skin looks more naturally alive, and feels soft and supple.
> However, this doesn't leave my skin feeling hydrated.

> SO - the purpose of this serum is of course to encourage / support the skins
Natural Moisturizing Factor = (NMF)
which in turn maintains the skins elasticity and supports synthesis of collagen which tightens the skin.
(> Which - the tightening effect is mostly how skin feels)
>>> Note that over moisturizing skin can actually weaken the skin barrier function
of self moisturizing.

This seem to be a good serum for problematic areas that more often get heavy wrinkles.
(forehead - nose - lips - eyes)

Comes in an attractive / quality / thick brown glass bottle - gold cap w/white dropper.
(total 3 1/2" tall - under 1 1/2" sq)
Expiration date on what I received = July 1, 2022 (stamped inside top flap of box)
5 stars

reviews.product_name: TINY BUDDHA Mindfulness Gift Set Includes Soothing Bath and Shower Gel, Relaxing Pillow Spray, Calming Essential Oil Roll-On, Lychee Flower Scented Candle and Daily Mindfulness Practice Guide
reviews.title: Peacefulness - AM - Noon - PM
reviews.text:
smells nice.
> Lavender essential oil - shower / bath gel - 6.8oz
> Lavender pillow / room spray - 3.4oz
> Lavender / jojoba / almond oil - pulse point fragrance. - 0.3 oz

More important than the liquid contents is the self care info.
Excellent guidance for anyone - very gift-able.

reviews.product_name: Lemon Oil Towelettes - 20 Count
reviews.title: Smells like REAL fresh cut LEMONS
reviews.text:
(< listed in the order I like best)
All are good - it's a matter of preference - mines orange.

reviews.product_name: Untangled Fine Tooth Pin Tail Parting Comb - For Difficult Styling and Hair Extensions
reviews.title: Wicked nice for parting
reviews.text: I love the weight of this comb! It's super nice for parting because shown in the third picture the rat tail is nice and dull. I've owned a lot of styling combs in the past that feel like a needle on my scalp. The teeth on the comb are spaced perfectly so there isn't a crazy amount of snagging when combing through wet or dry hair which is so nice. If you're tender-headed and looking for a good comb to style or cut hair this one is excellent, especially value wise.

reviews.product_name: Bath Pillow for Bathtub, Spa Pillows for Neck Head Shoulders Back Support, Thick Bath Tub Cushion with 6 Suction Cups Men Women Breathable Comfort 4D Air Mesh Quick Dry Headrest Bath Accessories
reviews.title: Super fancy magic awesome bath time
reviews.text: It's so adorable and travel friendly too! I swear after covid is over I'm taking this bad boy to a hotel to soak with too. I love that they included a hanger so I don't have to keep it in the tub the whole time and risk mold. I think it's washer friendly too but don't quote me on that. Inside the pillow part there are some kind of beads that really massage your neck as you lay back. The design will surely fit all different types of tubs, we have a deep soaker and it fits perfectly. You even get an adorable travel case too as a bonus!

reviews.product_name: NATWAG Reusable Update Makeup Remover Cloths for Sensitive Skin - Microfiber Face Cloth Makeup Remover | Washable Round Makeup Remover Pads | Natural Facial Towels (2 Pads,2 Cloth) (Purple)
reviews.title: Tugged at skin and gave me a rash
reviews.text: I was hoping to find something to take off my makeup easily at night for those lazy nights where I can't be bothered. Normally I have a five step routine (I know it's excessive). I have very sensitive pale skin and tried to gently wipe off my foundation to start with and felt it just tugging really hard. The fabric itself is extremely soft, like a baby blanket. I feel bad taking off a few stars for that reason. These wipes might be good for someone with more hardy skin but I unfortunately can't use them.

reviews.product_name: Cutting Scissors Set 10 Pcs Professional Hairdressing Scissors Kit, Hair Cutting Scissors, Thinning Shears, Hair Razor Comb, Clips, Cape, Shears Kit for Home, Salon, Barber
reviews.title: Dangerous
reviews.text: This kit felt very cheap and dangerous. You really get what you pay for. The combs teeth were bent on both sets and very flimsy. The thinning sheers appear to have either been used or just made really poorly. They ripped my hair all the way down, and the scissors were not aligned at all so I couldn't use them. The blades on all the tools were very ragged and just felt cheap. I would not recommend this set to anyone with safety in mind.

reviews.product_name: Laloirelle Luminous Face Oil - Organic Pomegranate Oil, Cacao Oil Infused W/Brightening White Peony Root, Marigold Flower, Lotus Leaf - Glowing Skin That Feels Hydrated, Plump and Firm - 1.0 fl oz
reviews.title: My favorite
reviews.text: [[VIDEOID:1231ac12d6a6c6d773db870b6eaa118d]] I picked up four of this brands oils so far and a few are hit or miss but this one is one of my favorites by far. The scent is light, clean, and with a very fair hint of floral. Honestly, it smells like playdough and I'm not sure why. The ingredients are clean and I haven't noticed a single breakout regardless of how thick this oil is. As seen in the video it leaves a gorgeous dewy sheen to the skin so I would recommend this for either nighttime or for those who really love natural glowy makeup looks without foundation. My skin drinks this stuff right up!

reviews.product_name: Laloirelle Deep Hydration Face Oil - Nourishing Helichrysum Oil, Avocado Oil Infused With Red Ginseng, Shitake Mushroom, Elderflower - Unparalleled For Moisturizing Very Dry, Dull or Aging Skin - 1.0 fl oz
reviews.title: Luxurious and worth it
reviews.text: There's something deeply comforting about the scent of this. It's almost like a woodsy scent. The oil soaks right in like a dry oil so I love to apply this right out of the shower, my skin drinks it up. All you need to use is about two drops for the entire face, so cost wise it works out pretty well for a whole ounce. The packaging is really beautiful as well. This would make an ideal gift for a skincare lover.

reviews.product_name: COSMOCOS FromNature Perfect Cover BB Cream - Light Beighe/Natural Beige SPF 50+ / PA+++ Sun Protection, Natural Skin Tone, High Coverage Korean Cosmetic K Beauty - 50g (1.76 fl oz) (Light Beige)
reviews.title: Please make a paler shade!
reviews.text: Everything but the color is perfect. Admittedly I’m extremely pale, I can’t even find a MAC shade to match me; but this was SO yellow. The scent was fruity, almost reminded me of watermelon? And it applied beautifully with both hands and foundation brush. If there was some way to make this shade paler I would ditch my current foundation for this. It didn’t feel oily or cakey and felt like I was wearing a moisturizer.

reviews.product_name: TOUCH IN SOL Best of No Pore Blem Travel Kit - Face Makeup Primer, Big Pores Perfect Cover, Inner-Glowing Skin with Moisture, Long Lasting Makeup's Staying Kit
reviews.title: The absolute best of, award winning for a reason
reviews.text:
I’m normally not a fan of primers at all but this really helped my foundation not cake or break up around my t zone for the entire day.

The kit includes the regular primer, a primer water (for after foundation), and a primer essence (also for after foundation. I really prefer this over setting sprays which feel awful when they blast you in the eyes. All three products have a light almost fruity scent which may not be great for some people but I haven’t had any adverse reactions or breakouts. This would be excellent as a gift for the makeup lover for the holidays.

reviews.product_name: PINROSE Perfumes Bold Soul - Eau de Parfum Petals (Fragrance Towelettes) - Vegan, Cruelty-free, and Hypoallergenic Scent with Essential Oils - Notes of Crushed Blackberry, Tuberose, Vanilla, Cinnamon and Patchouli
reviews.title: Overpowering and not environmentally friendly
reviews.text:
My boyfriend complained that the scent was overwhelming and smelled like “old lady” perfumes and asked me not to wear it.

I also found the packaging to be wasteful, you can’t recycle any of it except for the box so if you do end up liking this sort of scent I would just buy the bottle instead.

reviews.product_name: Spanature Olive Hand & Body Lotion Travel Size Selection, 4 Pack, Revitalizing Moisturizer for Rough and Dry Skin, Nourishing and Gentle for All Skin Types, Made In Korea - 75 ml/2.53oz
reviews.title: Amazing for cuticles
reviews.text: I thought I was going to gift a few of these but I think I'll keep them for myself and put them in my bathrooms for guests. The packaging is super cute and the product itself displays really nicely too. I'd say it's a fairly lightweight moisturizer that when rubbed in melts like an oil. My cuticles were instantly revived. If they made a jumbo size of this I would use it on my whole body. The scent is great and I didn't need to reapply frequently because it really sunk in.

reviews.product_name: Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - Sulfate Free Salon Grade (2 x 16.9 fl oz) - Hydrating Toner - Shimmer Correction for Platinum Blonde, Silver, Light, and Grey Hair - New Formula
reviews.title: Still recovering from how much this dried my hair out
reviews.text: The shampoo is super pigmented and worked pretty well. Maybe too well though, it stained my forehead and now my brunette hair with highlights just has a weird burgundy purple cast to it which looks awful and kind of ruined my hair color. The conditioner was really terrible though, it felt like just applying another shampoo. My ends were extremely dried out and frizzy after using and I had just had a haircut so they weren't unhealthy. I wouldn't purchase this as a set.

reviews.product_name: Sand & Sky Face Roller & Massager Tool. Aussie Skincare Essentials Firming Face Roller, Sculpt, Sooth & Contour to Banish Puffiness and Boost Serum Absorption.
reviews.title: My new best friend
reviews.text:
I've been using this multiple times daily and it has a permanent home on my desk because of how much it helps relax my jaw and tmj. I used it not only my face but my neck and shoulders and it was absolutely heavenly.
I personally love the extra long handle so I don't apply too much pressure when rolling away. I do use it "upside down" and pull rather than push which I'm not sure if you're supposed to do but it feels a lot better that way.
This tool should last a lifetime if cared for properly so the price doesn't bother me as an investment piece.

reviews.product_name: Prairie Rose Organics Cocoa Butter Cream Peppermint Body Butter - Mint Cocoa Whipped Body Cream
reviews.title: Like the holidays in a jar
reviews.text:
My only wish was that the jar was bigger! I tried just a tiny bit on my hands at first and before I knew it I covered my whole body in this stuff. It melts beautifully into the skin and makes you smell good enough to eat. The scent is a perfect balance of chocolate and mint! My dry winter skin absolutely loved this formula and it really helped calm my skin after shaving.
I also adore the fact that the jar is reusable and recyclable. Will be repurchasing for sure!

reviews.product_name: Besame Cosmetics | Forever Red Lipstick - 1925 | Classic Color Lipstick | Vintage Makeup | Long Lasting Lipstick | Semi Matte Lipstick for Women | Moisturizing Lipstick for Sensitive Skin
reviews.title: Hands down the most beautiful red I've ever seen
reviews.text: My lips look like beautiful rubies. I have such a tricky time finding a good red that works with my skin tone being so pale. I could see this working for just about everyone and going viral. The packaging is absolutely decadent and screams luxury. I happily display it on my vintage style vanity because it just looks like it belongs there. The shape may not be something you're used to, but the vintage shape of the lipstick works as a lipliner and does all of the hard work for you. Everything about this company and lipstick deserves five stars.

reviews.product_name: 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Waterproof Natural Thick Fiber Mascara, Thick Thickening Lengthening, Dramatic Extension Voluminous Eyelashes Mascara, No Clumping, No Smudging Lasting All Day
reviews.title: Dramatic length. Long drying time. Stringy mess.
reviews.text: In my photo, the left side has 2 applications of peacock mascara, the right side has none at all, the difference in length is dramatic. This mascara glides on smoothly and clump free... HOWEVER, it’s stringy if that makes since, like the tiny fibers in it are extremely noticeable. (I attached a photo where even the wand itself is stringy.) The mascara doesn’t dry in a timely manner either. Five minutes after applying the mascara and it’s still not dry. I really wanted to love this mascara for the dramatic length it adds, however the quality is not what I expected.

reviews.product_name: Red Carpet Manicure Starter Kits
reviews.title: Great instructions, don’t forget to buy the gel color.
reviews.text: The light worked well and cured the gel polish as expected. The instructions were top notch, giving you precise directions on exactly what to do. This particular kit comes with most the items you need. The items not included are - nail file, buffer, and most importantly the actual gel color. However I have other gel brands and the red I chose worked with this set. I followed the instructions using all the supplies from the kit except the color and I’m very pleased with the result. I would recommend this over other brands offered at your local general stores.

reviews.product_name: Bath Pillow for Bathtub, Spa Pillows for Neck Head Shoulders Back Support, Thick Bath Tub Cushion with 6 Suction Cups Men Women Breathable Comfort 4D Air Mesh Quick Dry Headrest Bath Accessories
reviews.title: My favorite spa like tub pillow!
reviews.text: Great spa like bath pillow! The pillow is plush and thick, unlike our last pillow. The material is fabric and easy to wash in the washer, so much better than our last plastic/vinyl covered tub pillow that was cold to the touch. The suction is much better and stronger on this pillow, with 6 large suction cups. The pillow also has a hanger on it for drying purposes but tucks away when in use. Hands down a great bath pillow that’s very spa like!

reviews.product_name: Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Shampoo with Natural Essential Oils for Moisturizing Skin & Hair, 8.5 oz.
reviews.title: Softly mint scented beard perfection!
reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband as he’s quite the beard connoisseur, from shampoos and conditioners to oils and balms. He was highly pleased with this shampoo and conditioner. He likes the soft minty scent of both and enjoyed that they weren’t too strong in smell. The shampoo lathered well and to his expectations, while the conditioner helped soft the course hairs. Overall a fantastic Amazon find!

reviews.product_name: BFWood
reviews.title: Decent Brush For Thin Short Hair
reviews.text: As most of us are in quarantine and not currently getting regular hair maintenance, having weird hair right now is just normal. I am growing out a pixie cut, not by choice, but by mandate of the State of Michigan. I have experienced a number of difficult hair transitions during this stay home, stay safe period, all of which I hope to never experience again. No comb, no brush, no anything. Now that I actually have hair that tangles and needs attention I require tools. The comb has some heft to it and it does a good job getting my part straight.

reviews.product_name: Facial Skincare,Cucumber Essence Hydrating Moisturizing Revitalizing Hydration Fruit Extract Deep Cleaning Facial Skincare Sheet for All Skin Type Care, 35ml/1.18oz, Pack of 5
reviews.title: A Very Balmy, But All Around Good Face Mask
reviews.text: I liked these masks and although I did have some issues with the 'essence' and absorption, I did not have any allergic reactions. I have been using masks to combat skin issues I have been having from wearing medical masks. It was not bad, but my face did feel sticky for hours afterwards and I woke up with a tacky face in the middle of the night. Seriously, it was a lot of cucumber. I had to change my pillow case in the morning.

reviews.product_name: Kneipp Body Lotion (Lavender)
reviews.title: A Real Lavender Lotion That Works
reviews.text:
I am sort of a lavender lotion expert. I love the stuff. Most lotions that have lavender either smell like nothing or smell like an entire shop of flowers. This lotion is not thin, but if you are used to a thick cream it will seem thinner. The scent is not overpowering and I think it does not linger, but is just right.

One complaint I do have is that the bottle had no safety seal. Kneipp needs to add a seal on their tubes.

This is not a sticky or overwhelming lotion and does not leave your skin feeling greasy.

reviews.product_name: Tirtyl Hand Soap Sheet Variety Pack - 240 Pack with Portable Storage Tin - Camping/Outdoor/Travel/Handbag - Lavender & Aloe - Bergamot & Ylang Ylang - Jasmine & Patchouli
reviews.title: A Lovely Change From Hospital Soap
reviews.text: It is abrasive and it has a scent that is so distinct and it sticks with you for hours and hours after you have washed your hands. Not only do they pack light - I can stick one little tin in my bag and it takes up almost no space at all, but the sheets themselves are tiny. The sheets dissolve nearly instantly in water, lather perfectly and the smell so nice. They are like a little bathroom oasis at the doctor or hospital.

reviews.product_name: Magnetic Eyelashes Kit,Magnetic Eyelashes and Eyeliner Kit,with Most Natural Look,12 Pairs Magnetic Eyelashes & 3 Magnetic Eyeliner,Reusable Magnetic Eyelashes,No Glue Need
reviews.title: Beyond my expectations
reviews.text: These things exceeded my expectations by far! They were only a tad heavy. The next night I followed directions. Put a coat on let dry then add another coat. The only real time it takes is deciding which ones to use as there are so many nice selections. I’ve gotten o many complements. There’s magnet particles on eyeliner and the lashes are on a magnet strip. That sounds crazy. Plus, my hands aren’t that steady. When removing, start at corner and peel off. To remove eyeliner I used cold cream. Just water doesn’t work. So cry all you want with these lashes ladies.

reviews.product_name: NEW Challenger Men's Rinse Free Hand Wash - 1oz - Portable, 30% Alcohol Hand Wash both Cleans & Moisturizes. Hydrates Hands, Forearms, & Skin - Cleansing 30% Alc. Based Formula Washes and Nourishes
reviews.title: This is great on the go, especially during covid
reviews.text: I love this stuff. It’s great during pandemic and I prefer it over the gel or wipes.

reviews.product_name: MOSTORY Glitter Crystal Liquid Eyeshadow Set - 4 Pack Pigmented Liquid Eye shadows Matte Shimmer Metallic Quick Dry Crease Resistant Long Lasting Flake-Proof Blendable Non-Greasy Eye Makeup (4 Pack)
reviews.title: The best eyeshadow I’ve ever used and stays on over 12 hours
reviews.text: I’ve tried another brand of white before and it was like water. Also, I’m not good at applying liquid eyeshadow. It’s a sponge tip like will come in lipstick or lip gloss. reviews.product_name: Facial Steamer with Portable Mini Cold Facial Mister, Face Steamer for Facial Deep Cleaning, Nano Ionic Face Hot Steaming Machine for Home Facials Personal Moisturizing Skincare Beauty
reviews.title: Quick and powerful
reviews.text:
Basically, the mister is a nice thing you can use to cool down and refresh your skin on the go.
- Packaging suggests two different types of water for the steamer and mister respectively.
- steamer = distilled water
- mister = mineral water
- The steamer's cord is about 2.5 feet long, which is something you will want to consider when decided where you will be most likely to use the steamer.
- The little extras like the headband with ears and the pore clearing tools make this a great gift to give someone who enjoys getting and giving facials.
- The manufacturer warns that acne which is hormonal in nature will not respond to the steamer
- The instructions also advise you not to use the steamer everyday, nor more than 10 minutes at a time.

reviews.product_name: Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - Sulfate Free Salon Grade (2 x 16.9 fl oz) - Hydrating Toner - Shimmer Correction for Platinum Blonde, Silver, Light, and Grey Hair - New Formula
reviews.title: A product with a useful purpose
reviews.text:
Purple shampoo aims to prevent the yellow cast that you sometimes see on gray hair, but it didn't give my hair any odd blue look. The shampoo is a very dark purple color, but it did not stain the shower, the conditioner is a much lighter color.
Both the shampoo and conditioner have little or no fragrance, the shampoo suds well in hard water and rinses easily. The bottle are attractive pump units that were easy to use in the shower. Persons with blonde or gray hair will find these products useful to prevent that brassy look.

reviews.product_name: UNNY CLUB Cover Glow Cushion 0.3 Oz / 11g Beige Color SPF50+, Flawless Gloss Cushion Powder Complex Single Layer Concealer Cover Moisture Essence Tight Fit, Korea Cosmetics (No.21 Light Beige)
reviews.title: Ideal make-up when you are on the go
reviews.text:
This makeup is very different than any other I have used in terms of how it is stored and applied; however, I really, really like it.
If you are someone who travels or likes to touch up your foundation throughout the day, this might well be the perfect makeup for you.
It comes in a very well designed compact that holds the liquid foundation in a sponge in its own closed compartment.
The applicator sponge sits atop the cover to that compartment, so the entire thing is spill proof and well protected.

Applying the makeup I found that it blended very well using the included applicator sponge.
The coverage level is medium, evening out skin tone and obscuring imperfections, but not covering major discoloration.
Put another way, if you have a mole or blemish you really want to cover up, you would probably still want to use a spot corrector.

The foundation itself has a matte finish with a nice feel.
I've found I can wear it on its own or with a powder finish.

Color matches are always tricky, particularly online; however, I managed to get a pretty great one.
Unless I have been getting a lot of sun, my skin is pretty pale.
I'm basically one step up from ivory skin, which this Beige Color blended with extremely well.

To show how well it blends and how matte the finish is, I applied it onto one half of my inner forearm, then took photos in two different light settings.
In the photos, the bottom half of my forearm has the foundation on it, but it leaves almost no line and no shine.

As far as staying power is concerned, I would rate this is above average.
It stayed on well for me all day when I was not sweating, but would come off a little on anything that directly rubbed against my skin.
I also found this to be a gentle foundation that did not irritate my skin.

I can happily recommend this foundation compact.
I was truly pleased with both the design of the dispenser, which makes it perfectly portable, and with the performance of the makeup itself.

reviews.product_name: Bloomeffects - Natural Tulip Dew Face Cream | Cruelty-Free, Non-Toxic, Clean Beauty (1.7 oz | 50 ml)

reviews.text:

The ingredients are listed on the box, but printed in such a fashion that I couldn't read them even with my trusty magnifier.
For me this cream did not irritate, did not feel greasy, and left my skin feeling dewy. The illuminating factor I really couldn't notice. Over all a very nice facial cream.

I was dry long as I wasn't moving around to much and in a cool place. The jasmine scent is wonderful. It is a small jar but you get a lot.

reviews.title: Short Hair Only
reviews.text: My hair is naturally curly so , I wanted to see how it would do on a blowout. I like the curly pattern that it creates the only problem I had was my hair was to long for this, pulling your hair threw with the hook that's given was easy. It did not hurt to pull your hair threw the spiral curlers.

reviews.product_name: AMAJULIE Non Slip Flexible Silicon Wigs Fix Strong Hold Comfort Silicone Lace Wig Grip Transparent Headband Hair Band Adjustable for Lace Wigs (Light Brown)
reviews.title: My new friend
reviews.text: I love this thing, it's very comfortable and has nice snug fit. It's not to tight and the ridges are on the top and bottom so it stays on your head and grips the lace on the wig. You don't see the grip under your lace, this thing really keeps your wig on. You must be wearing a Lace Front wig for it to work.

reviews.product_name: Glitter Poly Nail Gel Extensions Builder Gel UV/LED Soak Off Acrylic Fashion Gel Polish Set for Nails Beginner DIY Nail Art at Home 8 colors-15g (Pink series)
reviews.title: The best I’ve used so far
reviews.text: This kit only comes with the poly gel, nail forms and a free gift. You will need your own tools to apply. I love this formula, very easy work with it doesn’t dry fast so you have to build or layer. What I like the most that after putting under the lamp your nails don’t have that tacky layer. So the poly gel is sheer but building as in adding more will make it thicker. I also like the nail forms.

reviews.product_name: Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set.
reviews.title: Soft on skin, hard on makeup
reviews.text: This took off layers of foundation and contouring easily, but was soft on the skin while removing them. I like the loops on each pad because I can hook a finger through the loop to keep the pad in place while I wash my face.

reviews.product_name: Biutee Poly Nail Gel Kit 15ml 0.53oz Pink Nail Extension Gel Builder Gel Long Lasting Nail Salon Nail Art Design DIY at Home Beginner Friendly…
reviews.title: Not long lasting
reviews.text: The polygel is very sticky and hard to smooth out on the mold. I used nail polish remover in between nails to make it a little easier. Once the gel was finally applied, I was impressed, but the nails only lasted two days before falling off during daily activities like washing my hair and doing the dishes. And that was after I put dip powder on top of the polygel for color. Also note that this is only the gel, you have to order a mold separately to help put them on.

reviews.product_name: Altaba Long Wavy Wigs Ombre Red Synthetic Wigs Middle Part Natural Looking Heat Resistant Party Cosplay Full Wig for Women
reviews.title: Gorgeous color, not a great part
reviews.text: I love the color and feel of this wig. It is vibrant, flowy, and truly makes me feel gorgeous. However, there is a distinct line across the middle part that I cannot pluck away so there is a clear line at the scalp separating the hair from the forehead. If I could just pluck the wig to have a better hairline, I would rate this higher.

reviews.product_name: UJM Magnetic Eyelashes 10 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelash and Eyeliner Kit Natural Look False Lashes with Tweezers No Glue Needed Waterproof Magnetic Lashes
reviews.title: Not for begginers
reviews.text: Okay, so these are not the best for beginners. I am new to makeup and lashes and I struggled HARD with these. The liner is hard to control and leaks a bit. I have had it seep into the corners of my eyes multiple times and it stings a little bit. The eyelashes stick on well everywhere except for the inside of the eyelid. The last magnet often lifts upward right by the tear duct. It is really hard to keep the whole lash down. I have successfully applied them once. Really would not recommend for beginners.

reviews.product_name: JDO Eyelash Curler and 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Value Set-Lash Curler with Refill Pads for No Pinching or Pulling, Mascara Natural Thickening- Long Lasting Waterproof & Smudge-Proof
reviews.title: Didn’t notice much difference than regular mascaras
reviews.text: I was not very impressed.. it acts just like a regular cheap mascara, nothing impressive about it.

reviews.product_name: BFWood
reviews.title: Firm brush
reviews.text: It’s a good brush, firm and sturdy but it does hurt the scalp a little bit, it’s good for brushing but it can hurt! It’s not very flexible.

reviews.product_name: 3D Mink Eyelashes Natural Long Lashes 2 in 1 Self-adhesive Eyeliner Instead of Adhesive 5 Different Styles Pairs Kits Sets with Tweezers , NO NEED GLUE
reviews.title: I’m excited with this kit!
reviews.text:
So while most magnetic eyeliners requires 2-3 min to dry, this one takes 20 to 30 seconds!

Such a nice kit, 5 pairs of different sizes and thickness lashes, very good quality.
This kit is worth the price and benefits of it!

reviews.product_name: Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000)
reviews.title: Good quality!
reviews.text:
Got it for my girls!

It’s thick and not heavy and it doesn’t hurt as much! It won’t break easily and colored ones are cute pastel and the black ones are just as nice for adults

Good quality

reviews.product_name: Wiwoseo Faux Mink Lashes False Eyelashes Dramatic 20MM Long Wispy Cat Eyes Look Lashes 20 Pairs Mixed 2 Styles Fake Eye Lashes Wholesale Pack
reviews.title: Cute lashes
reviews.text: [[VIDEOID:360f58bdb171ac2bf8071487920bdaf5]] These lashes are cute! It has a lot of volume. It looks like mink eyelash extensions. It’s not super thick. That makes them feel comfortable. I don’t  feel like I have a lazy eye when I wear them.

reviews.product_name: Nxconsu 8Pcs Rhinestone Headbands for Women Girls Teens Kids Fashion Comfort No Hurting Hair Accessories Thin Hair Bands Crystal Exquisite Color Selection
reviews.title: Super cute
reviews.text: [[VIDEOID:3de34f65c626f460a016d968e891ae30]] These headbands are super cute and they are super sturdy. None of the rhinestones fell off of it. They were well-made. They were packaged really well. They are really comfortable. The colors are really cute.

reviews.product_name: Facial Skincare,Cucumber Essence Hydrating Moisturizing Revitalizing Hydration Fruit Extract Deep Cleaning Facial Skincare Sheet for All Skin Type Care, 35ml/1.18oz, Pack of 5
reviews.title: It really works
reviews.text: These facemasks are really good. It really soothe my skin. The mask makes my skin feel so soft. I did not feel any tingles from it. It did not leave any rashes or pumps I didn’t get any reaction from it.

reviews.product_name: UV LED Nail Lamp – 128W Rapid-Curing Gel Nails Dryer for Manicures and Pedicures – Dual-Voltage with Extra-Long Cable, Multi-Language Manual – Professional Gel Lamp for Homes or Salons by OVLUX, Gold
reviews.title: Get it!!
reviews.text: This little lamp works really well when I say it works it really works. It dries my nails so quickly like it doesn’t need to even take the whole 30 seconds. This is really worth the cost. This is great for personal use or salon use. You can even remove the bottom part of the lamp in order to do is dry someone’s feet or a dry your hands if it’s being difficult. It was packaged really well. It didn’t take so long to dry the polygel also. This is a great gift to a nail tech.

reviews.product_name: Hetianmei® Pink Rhinestone Headbands for Women，Jewel Headband，Bling Diamond Headbands Crystal Fashion Sparkly Jeweled Thick Headbands for Woman
reviews.title: cute headband
reviews.text: This headband is super cute. The color is gorgeous. It was made really well. I did not find any flaws. It fit my head comfortably. It doesn't feel too tight. It's a cute Christmas gift.

reviews.product_name: SOFTACULOUS Foot Peeling Mask Booties – 2 Pairs, Baby Soft Skin in 7 Days
reviews.title: good for callus
reviews.text: The foot mask will have your feet feeling like a baby's feet after using it. It takes a while for your foot to begin peeling. When it starts peeling it looks horrible. I advise you to follow the instruction. If you have sensitive I would advise you to not use it.

reviews.product_name: MOSTORY Glitter Crystal Liquid Eyeshadow Set - 4 Pack Pigmented Liquid Eye shadows Matte Shimmer Metallic Quick Dry Crease Resistant Long Lasting Flake-Proof Blendable Non-Greasy Eye Makeup (4 Pack)
reviews.title: Layer Up For Best Effect
reviews.text: I used the copper and the white/silver to create the effect in the picture. I love that the color was long lastig and definitely shimmery. It didn't flake off as some glitter based ones do. I found the best effect occurred if I let a layer dry and then added more - to build up the shine but if I didn't wait long enough between layers it did get a little clumpy. Overall a fun addition for the holiday / party season.

reviews.product_name: LUXAZA 6 PCS Purple Eyeshadow Stick,Light Shimmer Cream Eyeshadow Crayon,Pro Smoky Waterproof & Long Lasting Eyeshadow Stick Set
reviews.title: All About The Purple!
reviews.text: These are really good purple options. The crayons make it easy to use for underlining the eyes. It was a little tricky to use as a shadow, with more being needed and it definitely took more work to do that, but as a general addition to my make up I was pleased.

reviews.product_name: Busy Co. Biodegradable Hydrating Hand Wipes, With Collagen and Peptides to Smooth and Improve Elasticity, 15 Individually Wrapped Wipes (Refresh Line - Fresh Citrus)
reviews.title: Convenient Individual Packets!
reviews.text: These are very convenient to throw in your purse when you are on the go, especially with everything going on at the moment. Working out at just under $1 a use they are pretty good value for money. They don't have a harsh scent and they aren't drying on your skin which is always a plus. A good product!

reviews.product_name: UJM Magnetic Eyelashes 10 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelash and Eyeliner Kit Natural Look False Lashes with Tweezers No Glue Needed Waterproof Magnetic Lashes
reviews.title: Fabulous!
reviews.text: I love magnetic lashes - they have totally changed how I feel about False eyelashes and I use them ALL the time. This set comes with two liquid liners which I love! The lashes stay all day with no issues at all and the variety of styles means you can have them looking more natural - or super dramatic. The only thing I would say is that they say reusable - and I know people that do wash and reuse them but my eyes are sensitive and so I only use each pair for a single use.

reviews.product_name: 2 Pack Hair Towel Wrap Turban Microfiber Drying Shower and Bath, Twist Head Towels with Button, Magic Quick Dryer, Hair Care for Women and Girls, One Wrap Plus One Cap and Two Velvet Hair Bands
reviews.title: Very Soft but not good  for longer / thciker hair.
reviews.text: My daughter has thick hair which sits a couple of inches below her shoulders and takes forever to dry so I hoped these would be a good solution. Sadly although they are super soft, they don't absorb enough if you have longer / thicker hair. My hair is shorter and thinner than my daughters and although it worked better on that - it still wasn't much better than a regular towel. Very cute - but disappointing results.

reviews.product_name: Multicolors Crimped Bobby Pins, 96 Counts 2 Inches Non Slip Grip Hair Pins For Women, Safe Rubber Tips & Strong Grip Bob Pins, Bobby Pins Blonde, Black, Brown, Green
reviews.title: Great Pins At A Great Price
reviews.text: As someone who works with wigs a lot, having various color options is important to me, as these pins generally are only good for one use (although I have used these for a couple of uses before having to ditch them). Having all the colors in one set is great and very convenient for someone like me - or if you have more than one hair color in the house.

reviews.product_name: TOUCH IN SOL Best of No Pore Blem Travel Kit - Face Makeup Primer, Big Pores Perfect Cover, Inner-Glowing Skin with Moisture, Long Lasting Makeup's Staying Kit
reviews.title: A Good Primer - But Heavy For Regular Use
reviews.text: This is a great kit, for when you REALLY want your make-up to be on point. The primer gives a really great base and helps the foundation to look smooth and not crack, the ONLY downside is that for me, it doesn't allow my skin to breathe enough and I end up with breakouts if use it more than on the odd occasion which is a shame. That being said a little goes a very long way, and on the days when I need my make up to be extra perfect then this gives me great results!

reviews.product_name: LeiCare Tweezers Precision 2-Pack - Stainless Steel Slant Tweezers for Ingrown Hair – Professional Tweezer Set with Slanted Tips for Eyebrows and Splinter Removal - Eyebrow Plucker Kit
reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.text: These tweezers are fabulous. They grip even the smallest of hairs with no issues. The larger ones are so good that I haven't really needed the smaller ones (although I did try them just so that I could compare for the review). Very impressed! Highly recommend!

reviews.product_name: Pippa Of London Magic Star Eyeshadow Powder Pencil, Long Lasting, Blendable Eye Make Up Stick
reviews.title: Worth The Money!
reviews.text: I have always been a fan of black eyeliner. I never considered using anything else until now. I LOVE how bright this makes my eyes look. The pencil can be used in various ways but by far my favorite is to use it as an eyeliner. It's amazing quality, and although a little more expensive than I would have looked at before trying - now I'm a convert! I can't believe it took me so long to give it a try!

reviews.product_name: Scrunchie Holder Stands with 8 Pack Large Size Scrunchies - Acrylic Hair Ties Organizer for Teenage Girls and VSCO Girls Gift Stuff
reviews.title: Such A Cute Idea!
reviews.text: I LOVE Scrunchies - I am so excited that they are making a comeback and this is such a fun way to store them.
