reviews.product_name: 10 Pack Wide Headbands, 4 Style knot Turban Hairband Vintage Head wrap Hair Band Elastic Hair Accessories
reviews.title: So Many choices
reviews.text: Every print is beautiful. This is an amazing deal. My daughter is very picky anything to tight or loose around her head  she won't wear. These fit perfect they are light and don't dig in on the sides of her head. Even I can wear them and I have a big head. The fabric in all of them is nice. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.product_name: SELF/ish Men's Face Scrub | Exfoliating Facial Cleanser | Deep Cleansing | Effective Shave Prep & Beard Exfoliator for Men | Natural Ingredients | 3.4fl oz
reviews.title: husband approved
reviews.text: During the day my husband collects a lot of dirt oil and debris and get trap into his pores resulting into huge blackheads. He's been using this for about 3 weeks and he has noticed a big difference. He loves the citrus smell and the texture is just right not to rough. Great price for great product. He highly recommends this Self/ish scrub.

reviews.product_name: Automatic Hand Soap/Sanitizer Dispenser Kit - Table liquid Dispenser Pump Station 13.5 oz. Alcohol-Based Sprayer
reviews.title: Works great
reviews.text: [[VIDEOID:f1373a8a0778257c8e8f5a05050182d8]] Love how easy it is to refill the opening is wide enough to fill. It releases just the right amount of handsanitzer I was worried that it will make a big mess while no one place their hand on the sensor but the sensor is tuck under the release spout . Battery Life  has lasted a long time so  far I've been using it for a month and battery life is still good. I didn't use very liquid hand sanitizer so I do have to sometimes swipe the last drop on the tip.

reviews.product_name: UV LED Nail Lamp – 128W Rapid-Curing Gel Nails Dryer for Manicures and Pedicures – Dual-Voltage with Extra-Long Cable, Multi-Language Manual – Professional Gel Lamp for Homes or Salons by OVLUX, Gold
reviews.title: Ok nail lamp
reviews.text: It get the job done cures gel nails and is spacious inside for hand or foot. Quality wise I wouldn’t say it’s professional level but good home home use. The plastic seems a little on the flimsy side, when I pick up the nail lamp the bottom piece sometime falls of I don’t think the magnets are strong enough at the bottom. Overall ok for home use only

reviews.product_name: Gel Nail Polish Set, Holiday Red Black 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use
reviews.title: Basic colors is a must
reviews.text: My favorite red and black so far. All the colors lasted 2 weeks except the white one that one chip within a week. The thickness is just right very easy to apply. Can’t beat the price either great deal

reviews.product_name: Disney Frozen - Townley Girl Mega Nail Set with Nail Dryer Foldable Gift Set for Parties, Sleepovers and Makeovers
reviews.title: Best one
reviews.text: This has everything you need to pretend play with your little one. My daughter loves that she gets to use a nail dryer like her mommy’s. She has told everyone about it and can’t wait to be able to have play dates once again so she can play spa with her friends. No chemical smells, seems safe so far beautiful colors.

reviews.product_name: 12ML Refillable Perfume Atomizer Bottle for Travel Spray Scent Pump Case Pack of 5
reviews.title: Great for my body products biz
reviews.text: I was looking for something that was pretty but still economical to offer custom fragrances to my customers. I found these atomizers and it just fit the bill to a T! They seem well made and fit into a purse perfectly. My customers really love them!! And I offer them a discount if they return it for a refill so it helps the environment.

reviews.product_name: JDO Eyelash Curler and 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Value Set-Lash Curler with Refill Pads for No Pinching or Pulling, Mascara Natural Thickening- Long Lasting Waterproof & Smudge-Proof
reviews.title: Mascara and curler in one!
reviews.text: What a great deal to get an eyelash curler along with your mascara, and they match in red also! This mascara goes on nicely and doesn’t clump. The eyelash curler even comes with replacement pads which is a really nice touch. I highly recommend this set!

reviews.product_name: 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Waterproof Natural Thick Fiber Mascara, Thick Thickening Lengthening, Dramatic Extension Voluminous Eyelashes Mascara, No Clumping, No Smudging Lasting All Day
reviews.title: Pretty tube and goes on nicely
reviews.text: I love anything peacock and so this caught my attention because of the packaging. But it’s actually a very good mascara that goes on nicely without clumping. The brush is on the thinner side but that makes it especially useful when doing your lower lashes. I was very impressed with the packaging which went beyond my expectations. I really like this mascara!

reviews.product_name: 5pcs Nail Art Liner Brushes, Lystaii Dual-ended Painting Nail Design Brush Pen Include Liner Brushes and Dotting Pen Nail Art Point Drill Drawing Brush Double Ended Dotting Tools Set 5,7,9,11,14mm
reviews.title: Not just for nails
reviews.text: This set can be used for so many things including mandala painting, rock painting, eyeliner brushes, food photography, jewelry making, etc. I love how beautiful the barrels are with the gorgeous iridescent stones inside. It’s a well-built set that comes in a nice thick clear pouch. Awesome set!

reviews.product_name: 10 Pack Wide Headbands, 4 Style knot Turban Hairband Vintage Head wrap Hair Band Elastic Hair Accessories
reviews.title: A headband for every outfit!
reviews.text: I have a headband collection because I hate having bangs in my face when it’s warm. This set has colors and designs for just about any outfit I wear. And they are comfortable to wear which is a big deal since I have a big head. I couldn’t be happier!

reviews.product_name: Bath Pillow for Bathtub, Spa Pillows for Neck Head Shoulders Back Support, Thick Bath Tub Cushion with 6 Suction Cups Men Women Breathable Comfort 4D Air Mesh Quick Dry Headrest Bath Accessories
reviews.title: Super comfy
reviews.text: I Purchased this pillow because I have a bathtub from 1960 and it’s very uncomfortable. I’ve used the little blowup plastic pillows in the past but they just don’t quite do the trick. I thought I would try something a little bit larger that doesn’t need to be blown up and I’m extremely happy I did. What’s nice about this is that you can throw it in the washing machine every once in a while to get it really clean. Love these!

reviews.product_name: Karuna Oh, Glow On Face Mask Sheet, Skincare and Beauty Facial Masks with Moisturizing and Collagen Promotion Properties for Healthy Glow, Contain Green Tea, Vitamin C and Pineapple (3 Sheets)
reviews.title: Does a great job
reviews.text: I felt a little like Silence of the Lambs wearing this mask but I must say it really does a great job keeping the moisturizer on your face. It smells nice and feels cool on your skin. I really like using it and feel it’s a go to for weekend pampering.

reviews.product_name: 3D Mink Eyelashes Natural Long Lashes 2 in 1 Self-adhesive Eyeliner Instead of Adhesive 5 Different Styles Pairs Kits Sets with Tweezers , NO NEED GLUE
reviews.title: Game Changer!
reviews.text: I was a little nervous about using magnetic eyelashes for the first time. But these are actually very easy to use and stick well to the eyeliner as long as you do two coats. I love the fact that you have three pair of more natural looking lashes and two pair of more dramatic for evenings out. I did have to trim mine a little but I hear that’s normal for most people. I love the fact that I can have gorgeous lashes again now that I’m in my 50s. I wear these to work every day.

reviews.product_name: Hetianmei® Pink Rhinestone Headbands for Women，Jewel Headband，Bling Diamond Headbands Crystal Fashion Sparkly Jeweled Thick Headbands for Woman
reviews.title: Love these padded headbands
reviews.text: So it’s official! I own 40 different headbands in different colors, textures and padding. These padded headbands are extremely comfortable and work well on a larger head like mine. Although the headband isn’t covered in actual crystals, the little plastic beads give off a little iridescent sparkle when hit by the sun. It’s quite fetching! And the color is a really nice neutral pink.

reviews.product_name: QTMY Fashion Rhinestone Flower Headband,Wide Hair Hoop for Women,Hair Accessories Head Band Headwear,White
reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
reviews.text: So in the past year, I have started collecting headbands because my hair has been thinning on top and it’s a great way to disguise it. At this point I have about 30 headbands and this has got to be one of my favorites! You would think it would be uncomfortable or heavy with all of the rhinestones embedded on it, but not at all. And I’ve gotten so many compliments on it because it is just so different than your typical headband. The best part is that there are so many colors in the jewels that it will go with many different outfits. I can’t say enough good things about this headband.

reviews.product_name: Headbands for Woman Pearls Headbands,Logiverl 2PCS Pearls Headband Elegant Hair Clip Hairpins Headwear Barrette Styling Tools Accessories for Christmas Gift
reviews.title: Satin Braided with Pearls
reviews.text: This peachy pink color and mint color are very spring like. Great set to have for those pastels that we’ll be wearing in March April and May. They are very comfortable and very feminine. They look quality made and the pearls stay put. They are also a great way to hide thinning hair!

reviews.product_name: John Frieda Detox and Repair Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Nourishing Avocado Oil and Green Tea, 8.45 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)
reviews.title: Good shampoo and conditioner
reviews.text: So maybe I wasn’t sure exactly what I should expect after using the shampoo and conditioner. I know you’re supposed to use a different shampoo and conditioner at least once a week to get rid of build up. That’s what I was expecting this to be. It does a good job and my hair feels soft and nourished afterwards. I’m not real thrilled about the scent because it reminds me of Pantene. John Freida always puts out a top quality product so this is right up there. Definitely worth the once a week switch.

reviews.product_name: senvenski Gel Nail Polish Top and Base Coat Shine Mirror Eggshell Fur Matte Crystal Cat Eye Effect No Wipe Art Set Soak Off UV LED Lacquer Clear Resin Home Salon Use 6pcs (TB6-001)
reviews.title: Finally! Some top coats with pizzazz
reviews.text: I really love this set because it actually will take any color and add a little pizzazz. I really appreciate the fact that they included six white peel off stickers that you can either use to do a sample of the color inside each bottle or put a name on it. I chose to do the latter. They go on smooth and take probably 90 seconds to cure under the UV light. But this is a must have set for anybody doing gel nails.

reviews.product_name: Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion - Superfood Infused Firming Body Lotion with Kale. 6.8 fl.oz, Anti-Aging Moisturizing Lotion For All Skin Types
reviews.title: Lightweight and quick absorbent
reviews.text:
A little goes along way!
This is a very lightweight moisturizer that absorbs quickly without any residue which is a plus. The scent is very subtle and not overbearing.
If you have really dry skin, it would not be the go-to product but works perfectly if you just need a little moisture refresher. While ots not the best lotion I've used, I'm pleased thus far.

reviews.product_name: Shakira Perfumes - Dance for Women - Long Lasting - Femenine, Charming and Modern Perfume - Fruity Floral Notes - Ideal for Day Wear - 1.7 Fl Oz
reviews.title: Smooth sensual aromas
reviews.text:
I'll start off by saying the bottle is absolutely gorgeous. Its full of golden sparkles!
This fragrance has smooth, sensual smell with aromas of jasmine, vanilla and soft musk.
The combination lends itself to a fresh, sweet smell at first that's later followed by a warm, musky base.
I normally wear jadore so this perfume is an affordable twist to switch it up.

reviews.product_name: PINROSE Perfumes Bold Soul - Eau de Parfum Petals (Fragrance Towelettes) - Vegan, Cruelty-free, and Hypoallergenic Scent with Essential Oils - Notes of Crushed Blackberry, Tuberose, Vanilla, Cinnamon and Patchouli
reviews.title: Uniquely enchanting
reviews.text:
These three notes truly create an enchanting effect!
It's scent reminds me of a sweet spiked cocoa that goes on decently strong smelling but in fact is extremely subtle once it settles. This perfume has a base of cocoa beans expertly blended with rum and vetiver.

reviews.product_name: Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - Blonde Shampoo - Made in USA - Purple Hair Silver Shampoo - Hair Toner Shampoo & Conditioner for Brassy Hair - Purple Toning Shampoo & Overtone Conditioner
reviews.title: Great for unwanted yellow tones!
reviews.text:
I've been getting my hair highlighted for longer than I can remember and due to my natural color, my hair tends to pull strong yellow and subtle orange tones about 2 weeks after getting it done. I've tried lot's of purple shampoos and they are not treated the same. It also doesn't stain my hair purple like many, but gently lightens and brightens my blonde hair!
This shampoo boosts its undertones as well as preventing fade and ramping up shine.

reviews.product_name: Plant Therapy Natural Acetone Free Nail Polish Remover 6 fl oz One Touch Dispensing Bottle with Flip Top Cap Tropical Flower Scent
reviews.title: Gently works!
reviews.text: So many nail polish removers either smell awful or leave my nails brittle and weak, but not this! The scent is one of the best I've smelled from a polish remover! This stuff is gentle on my nails and works!

reviews.product_name: Livordo Moroccan Argan Oil Essential Organic Cold Pressed Skin Moisturizer Rich in Vitamin E Powerful Antioxidants For Skin, Hair, Body, and Face 4 Oz
reviews.title: Amazingly soft skin
reviews.text: I'm a big fan of argan oil and have tried quite a few. I love this big 4 oz bottle because I like to use it on my body. This one is not as thick as other brands I've tried. I've used it mixed with lotion like I've used others but this one spreads easier and absorbs quicker. It leaves my skin like silk. I have dry skin all year round but winter it's the worst. This has helped it dramatically. The best is I can use this one by itself and it doesn't leave my skin too oily. It just feels amazing! I will definitely purchase this when I run out.

reviews.product_name: SERUM By MERLOT - RESVERATROL - NATURAL ANTI-AGING - DAMAGE CORRECTOR - BOOST COLLAGEN - 1 FL OZ. - DARK CIRCLE CORRECTOR -
reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.text: I've been using this for about 10 days now. I don't know what if anything it's doing long term yet. So far though I'm enjoying this serum. It has fantastic ingredients. Grape seed has excellent anti aging benefits. This serum is hydrating and works well under makeup. It hasn't irritated my skin which can be sensitive.

reviews.product_name: SAMYANG ABOUTME Red Recipe Super Cleansing Balm 3.04 oz. (90ml) - Soft Melting Milk Texture Makeup Cleansing Balm, Mineral Contained Nourishing & Soothing Cleansing, Rose Scented
reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.text: I always double cleanse. I first start with either a makeup wipe or micellar water. Then I go in with this. In the past I've tried Farmacy green clean and Pixie's balm cleanser (which is very good). I admit I was skeptical since I hadn't heard of it. I was pleasantly surprised! It gets all the makeup residue off my skin. It has a subtle rose 8scent. If scents bother you it goes away and it its very subtle. I love it. If you're into Korean skincare or are getting into it I recommend trying this.

reviews.product_name: Study Buddy Clay Mask with Detoxifying Bentonite, 3 fl. oz., Exfoliates, Brightens and Clears Pores, Clay Draws Out Impurities and Improves Skin's Texture and Tone by Higher Education Skincare
reviews.title: Really cleans out pores
reviews.text: This is a wonderful clay mask. Has a nice subtle sweet scent. I used a warm wet cloth and easily wiped it off. My skin was so smooth and so fresh looking. My pores were so clean and clear. They appeared smaller and tighter. I'm really happy with this mask. The directions recommend using once to twice a week. (Just a side note: I also recieved a retinoid cream from the same brand with the same expression date) and I just recieved these products. Just keep that in mind when purchasing. Product wise though is a definite 5 stars!

reviews.product_name: No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare
reviews.title: I REALLY enjoy this cleanser!
reviews.text:
This is a nice gentle cleanser. It's in gel form, reminds me of a thicker version of aloe vera. Although it's gentle on my semi sensitive skin it really gets the job done. Leaves my skin feeling clean without feeling dry and tight. I love the way my skin feels after I use it. Soft, healthy, and smooth. It is a bit pricey but it does a great job. After reading the directions I was a little confused
It says "apply through dampened fingers" is my face supposed to be wet? It's nice and gentle, there was no redness after use. I hoped this helped.

reviews.product_name: MBA Renewing Retinol Serum, 1.7 fl. oz, 0.5% Retinol Hydrates & Brightens Skin's Appearance by Diminishing the Look of Breakouts, Hyperpigmentation, and Signs of Aging by Higher Education Skincare
reviews.title: Very nice gentle product
reviews.text: Unfortunately this one and one other product I received expire in less than two months from when I recieved them. I have pretty nice skin because I take very good care of it. It doesn't irritate my skin or dry it out which is always a concern of mine when I use any type of retinol product. This is a nice serum consistency. My skin looks healthier and brighter. It didn't cause me any redness, which can be a problem for me, nor did it cause any irritation. Just keep in mind when ordering that a couple of products I recieved to review were very close to expiration.

reviews.product_name: Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare
reviews.title: Leaves my skin feeling amazing!
reviews.text: I've tried quite a few products from this brand and I've been happy with them all. So when I had the chance to try this product I was excited. It's a nice gentle exfoliant. It has a bunch of small grinds in it. It's easy to rinse off. It's good for sensitive skin. It does a really great job cleaning and exfoliating my skin. I love the way my skin feels afterwards. It feels very smooth. I do think it's a bit overpriced though, but it definitely does its job! I just recieved this recently and it expires in two months.

reviews.product_name: MD Complete Bright & Healthy Vitamin C+ Vitalizing Face Serum| with Vitamin C, Vitamin E and Herbal Extracts | Potent Antioxidant Protection, Nourishes, Brightens and Evens Skin 0.5 fl oz
reviews.title: Irritated, redness, inflamed
reviews.text: I gave this three stars a neutral rating rather than good or bad. I was very interested in this product since I always use vitamin C in my regimen I'm always checking out different brands. It's also a cruelty free product. Has a small dropper which is perfect since you only need a little bit. I still had a little trouble when applying my hyaluronic acid. (The drops are small). It has an awful smell that I can't place, but it's familiar from some other skincare products. My skin was left feeling very uncomfortable, irritated, and red. I hope my review has been helpful.

reviews.product_name: Dr. Denese SkinScience Essential Lipid Anti Aging Power Infusion Dry Oil - Skin Nutrients 97% Organic 100% Natural - Rejuvinating Blend with Amaranth & Resveratrol - Paraben-Free, Cruelty-Free - 2oz
reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!
reviews.text: I think I've fallen in love with Dr. Denese products. When I saw the words "essential lipid power" I had to try this. I do use her whipped moisturizer with lipids a few nights a week so I figure this serum would do wonders for my skin. I follow the directions and apply a few drops on my freshly cleansed skin prior to any other products. It makes my skin feel amazingly soft. I have no trouble applying my other serums after this. I wait until this serum absorbs. My skin has been looking so healthy. It has a new youthful bounce to it. This serum is already amazing.

reviews.product_name: NEW Challenger Men's Rinse Free Hand Wash - 1oz - Portable, 30% Alcohol Hand Wash both Cleans & Moisturizes. Hydrates Hands, Forearms, & Skin - Cleansing 30% Alc. Based Formula Washes and Nourishes
reviews.title: Moisturizing & Sanitizing Not greasy!
reviews.text: I always have to have some type of hand sanitizer on hand within reach. So of coarse my hands are usually dry from hand washing and sanitizing. Especially during this pandemic. It's looks and feels like a cross between lotion and hand soap. It also has a nice subtle scent. It does not leave any kind of film on my skin (don't use too much) which ends up picking up dirt and kinds of yucky things. (Example: after applying a greasy lotion on your hands it causes your hands to be quite dirty) My hands feel soft, not greasy, and sanitized.

reviews.product_name: Karuna Oh, Glow On Face Mask Sheet, Skincare and Beauty Facial Masks with Moisturizing and Collagen Promotion Properties for Healthy Glow, Contain Green Tea, Vitamin C and Pineapple (3 Sheets)
reviews.title: Lived up to its claims
reviews.text: I love a good sheet mask. I've tried another sheet mask from Karuna and I wasn't too impressed. I decided to give these a try because I love a brightening mask that claims to make my skin glow. I recieved 3 masks in a box. My face looked bright and clear. It was very hydrating and felt cool and relaxing. The mask is thin and biodegradable. It actually drips off the chin area. With clean hands I removed the mask after 20 minutes and massaged the serum into my skin. I also like to use my facial roller to help my skin absorb the serum. The Oh, glow on sheet masks are very good.

reviews.product_name: Karuna 7 Days of Glow - Face & Eye Mask Variety Pack (7 Sheets), Hydrate, Brighten and Glow
reviews.title: Very giftable, Great sheet masks
reviews.text: I've tried a couple sheet masks from Karuna before and really liked them. So when I saw this I really wanted to try it. It's a great easy to try a few of their sheet masks. They come in a nice box that opens and closes. Very giftable! Karuna sheet masks are so good I really see results. You recieve seven masks one of which is a pack of undereye patches. I'm really happy with theses. Plus they look lovely on my vanity.

reviews.product_name: Balance White Mud Balancing Mask by Au Natural Skinfood | Rotorua Exfoliating Mask with 16+ Manuka Honey | Certified | Food For Your Skin | All Skin Types | Made in New Zealand | 1.7 oz
reviews.title: Little quantity, high price point
reviews.text: This is a decent mask, but I didn't find it to be anything special. I have better masks that I'll reach for over this. The ingredients seem very nice. It does give my face a nice glow. The price point is ridiculous for the amount of product. If the mask was either the most amazing mask I've ever tried, you recieved more quantity for the price, or it was alot cheaper in price. Then I'd say go for it, but as it is I really don't recommend spending the money. There are alot better masks out there including here on Amazon.

reviews.product_name: Simply Dana Cellular De-Stressing Cream, Boost Skin's Natural Immunity - 1 oz (30g)
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
reviews.text: For this reviews sake I used this during the day under my makeup and it looked good. We expose our skin to alot of stresses in the environment and at night our skin rejuvenates. This jar may seem small but a little goes a long way so it should last some time. It's very hydrating and it doesn't leave a shine on your face. It's soft, smooth, and supple. I'm impressed with this cream. It's fragrance free and doesn't irritate my skin which can be mildly sensitive.

reviews.product_name: Bath Bombs, SAZEN Bath Bomb with Natural & Organic Essential Oils, Shea Coconut Butter for Skin Moisturize, Bubble Spa Bath, Birthday Mothers Day Christmas Handmade Gift Set for Women Kids Her Him
reviews.title: Nice Set, Great Gift
reviews.text: All around a very nice set, especially for the price. I've paid a lot more for a lot less. The bombs themselves are very nice. Very good aroma and they actually do moisturize as opposed to most others. The ones I've used so far colored the bath water. Not a problem as it didn't cause any "rings" on the tub and I came out with skin the same color as when I went in, minus some dirt. I'll be buying some as Christmas gifts. Recipients will think I spent a lot more that I actually did!. Highly recommended.

reviews.product_name: Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use
reviews.title: Good, Not Best
reviews.text: I have some other nail files that are very similar but are a bit stiffer and seem to last longer. After one use I can see wear on these files whereas I can't see it on my other files. And although they have the same grit they don't seem to cut as aggressively. They're good but not the best. Recommended for the price.

reviews.product_name: Tweezers for Eyebrows, MORGLES 5PCS Tweezers for Women Precision Tweezers Set with Eyebrow Brush Leather Case for Eyebrow Ingrown Hair Removal
reviews.title: Passed the "Grab a Hair" Test
reviews.text: Very nice set of tweezers along with an exceptionally sharp small pair of scissors. The case looks good and is secured by a snap connector. There are individual slide-in holders for each pair of tweezers and the scissors. The quality of the tweezers is outstanding. What I do is try to grad a single fine hair off of my arm. Each pair of tweezers passed the test. Another thing I like is that this set doesn't have a bunch of needless junk in it that just takes up room. This set can fit in my shaving kit without taking up extra space. Highly recommend.

reviews.product_name: Rancco Dried Flower Buds Fragrant Petals Ball, 10 Kinds Natural Organic Flowers Ball, Premium Grade Dried Blooming Flower Tea Balls for Tea, Baking or Bath Bombs
reviews.title: IMHO Not Fragrant and They're Tiny
reviews.text: The pictures of these "petal balls" on the web page are bigger than the actual balls. I was kind of expecting the opposite. I followed the directions and put one of the balls in a dish and poured boiling water over it. It was kind of fun to watch it re-hydrate but that was about the end of the enjoyment. The "fragrance" given off by these petal balls was akin to a weak tea although I surely wouldn't drink it. Plus I don't want to take a bath in a pot of tea.

reviews.product_name: Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - No, Orange, Yellow or Brassy Tones - Best Toner Treatment for Brassiness - Blonde, Grey, Bleached or Silver Hair - Sulfate Free
reviews.title: Not Just a Name, The Shampoo and Conditioner Really Are Purple
reviews.text: The shampoo has a soft floral fragrance that is very pleasant. It was purple, too, although thicker and lighter in color than the shampoo. As I rubbed the conditioner into my hair, the wonderful floral scent of the conditioner filled my shower--what a delightful sensory treat! So...even though the product information online says it works fine with gray and white hair, I look down at my purple stains on my hand and I have to wonder. If it turns my hair purple at some point in the future, I'll do an update and give everyone fair warning.

reviews.product_name: RAREKIND Fade Matte Lipstick by Amorepacific - 10 Colors, Cruelty-Free Nourishing Lip Stick, Velvety-smooth, Long-Lasting Moisturizing Lipstick - 3.2g Maple Road
reviews.title: Faded matte style, ordered Maple Road
reviews.text:
I like this lipstick. It is creamy and does not leave my lips dry.
I ordered Maple Road and I like the color; the description appears to be pretty accurate. Comparing my picture to the one on the listing, I think it is close to the "one coat" shade. It has like a faded look to it, hence the matte style. I do think it's closest to a red-orange with a brown tint to it as opposed to a red tint. I wore it for about eight hours and it lasted the entire time.

reviews.product_name: Nxconsu 8Pcs Rhinestone Headbands for Women Girls Teens Kids Fashion Comfort No Hurting Hair Accessories Thin Hair Bands Crystal Exquisite Color Selection
reviews.title: sparkly, some wider than others
reviews.text:
These headbands are really nice. The crystals are very pretty and sparkle nicely. They appear to well attached to the headband.
I did notice that some of the ends of the headbands were a bit sticky as if the felt was not properly wrapped.
Some of the headbands are wider. This is a problem for me beauty I already have issues with headbands sliding back with my egg/oval-shaped head, so a wide headband will most certainly slide off.
Aside from these two minor issues, the headbands are great. At less than two dollars a piece I think for the style and quantity these headbands are priced accordingly.

reviews.product_name: LUXAZA 6 PCS Purple Eyeshadow Stick,Light Shimmer Cream Eyeshadow Crayon,Pro Smoky Waterproof & Long Lasting Eyeshadow Stick Set
reviews.title: several layers needed, easily wipes off
reviews.text:
These are nice colors but several layers are required to achieve the color of the eyeshadow stick.
Once on the color does not last very long.
I spread the eyeshadow with my finger and I end up completely removing it from my eye.
That being said, the eyeshadow easily wipes off.
I like the color options but I think I would rather have them in powder form.

reviews.product_name: UV LED Nail Lamp – 128W Rapid-Curing Gel Nails Dryer for Manicures and Pedicures – Dual-Voltage with Extra-Long Cable, Multi-Language Manual – Professional Gel Lamp for Homes or Salons by OVLUX, Gold
reviews.title: great for resin projects
reviews.text:
I like this UV Led light.
I do not use this for nails, but for resin art projects.
It is large enough to fit large silicone molds in UV light.
I really like the light does not have to sit on a table to turn on, or by motion (which is an option). I can hold it up, set the seconds, and direct it towards my resin mold. This comes in handy for larger resin molds.

reviews.product_name: CIMIY Gel Nail Polish Set 8 bottles - Manicure Colors Infinity with Top Base Coat for Forest Nail Art Natural Daily All Seasons for Nail Profession Salon and Starter at Home Soak Off UV LED 0.32oz
reviews.title: colors as described, longer curing time but no stickiness when dry
reviews.text:
I like the colors of this set. They are just as described/pictured.
I did a quick manicure for the purpose of trying the gel polishes out and they really worked well.
They took about 90 secs to cure under the UV light for each coat (base, color, top) but at the end, they were completely dry without any stickiness or the need to wipe them.
They have a resin odor to them but it is not overly strong.
Overall, this is a nice set.

reviews.product_name: TOUCH IN SOL Best of No Pore Blem Travel Kit - Face Makeup Primer, Big Pores Perfect Cover, Inner-Glowing Skin with Moisture, Long Lasting Makeup's Staying Kit
reviews.title: keeps my makeup from defining my wrinkles
reviews.text:
This is a nice small set, perfect for travel or just to try it out.
I just recently started using a Touch in Sol primer and I really liked it, so I decided to try these out.
Just like the other primer, these worked great on my skin. I had started noticing that my makeup was defining my wrinkles and damaged/large pores and making them more noticeable. The Touch in Sol primers has definitely improved how my makeup looks.

reviews.product_name: John Frieda Detox and Repair Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Nourishing Avocado Oil and Green Tea, 8.45 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)
reviews.title: Great scent!! Works very well on my dry hair.
reviews.text:
I absolutely enjoy the scent of this John Frieda Shampoo & Conditioner. It smells clean, fresh, and sweet.
It leaves my hair feeling clean, without residue, and very soft and manageable.
I live in a very dry area and my hair lacks moisture and looks very frizzy. This definitely helps with the dryness and frizziness.
I really like what it does to my hair but the scent is definitely my favorite.
The set is a little high in price but it works very well and makes ups for the price tag.

reviews.product_name: AMOREPACIFIC Color Control Cushion Compact Broad Spectrum SPF 50+
reviews.title: lightweight, blends well on my yellow undertone skin
reviews.text:
Love this product.
Great on my dry acne-prone skin.
It feels lightweight and blends well on my yellow undertoned skin.
A little goes a long way so that helps with the (high) price and time between reordering, which I plan to do when I go through this container.

reviews.product_name: 2 Pack Foundation Full Coverage Liquid Foundation, Foundation Primer, 4 Makeup Sponge, Cosmetic Bag, 24HR Matte Oil Control Concealer Foundation (Nude #102+Buff Beige #104)
reviews.title: Great coverage on my acne scarred skin
reviews.text:
The foundation provides great coverage.
I have acne-prone skin and have dark spots, uneven tones, ​and acne scars and this foundation does a great job in covering all the imperfections.
Another thing that I like is that a little goes a long way.

reviews.product_name: Rated Green - Hibiscus Moisturizing Scalp Pack - Tube - 6.76 fl. oz. Cold Brewed Organic Hibiscus with Natural Honey - Softening Hair Mask for Women & Men
reviews.title: Not for me. Hair felt like it has a film over it.
reviews.text:
This avocado nourishing scalp hair mask seems to work but is not for me.
The smell is very nice.

reviews.product_name: ZUK Black Matte Lipstick 2Pcs Suede Cream Liquid Lipstick Set for Women, Vegan and Cruelty Free, 0.34 Fl Oz
reviews.title: easily wipes off, 2+ coats needed
reviews.text:
The liquid lipsticks do not go on thick.
It goes on thin and a couple of coats are needed to keep it from being sheer.
It has a faint chocolate scent, in my opinion.
It will easily wipe off. It is not long-wear or smudge-proof in my opinion. I will come off while drinking or eating something.
The lipstick did not dry my lips.

reviews.product_name: Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Complete Nail Art Gel Kits for DIY Manicure, Pink Nude Series
reviews.title: Pretty Decent Set! Avoid If Sensitive to Smells!
reviews.text: This is a pretty decent set! The only thing on the boxes were “Nail Polish” on 2 of them and “Gel Nail Polish” on the rest. I was wrong. The base and top coats were labeled on the outside of the bottles. It smells like burnt plastic 🤢 All Nail Polish stinks, but I’ve gotten used to the “regular” stink of nail polish. I love that you got an assortment of polish colors and an assortment of poly gel colors. I love it came with the tool needed for the poly gel nails. I love it came with glitter, foils, and strip tape to decorate the nails.

reviews.product_name: JDO Eyelash Curler and 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Value Set-Lash Curler with Refill Pads for No Pinching or Pulling, Mascara Natural Thickening- Long Lasting Waterproof & Smudge-Proof
reviews.title: A Great Mascara AND A Great Lash Curler!
reviews.text: I have pretty small, hooded eyes, so it’s hard to find a lash curler that works for my eyes. Well, not so much the mascara as I am the mascara wand. With my small, hooded eyes, it makes it so I end up with a lot of mistakes of the wand hitting below my lower lash line or onto my hood. I’m happy to say that the mascara wand isn’t too thick. I love the red, black, and gold. It looks so fancy! You’re getting an amazing lash curler and an amazing mascara.

reviews.product_name: EMMOR Long Ombre Brown Wig for Women - 23 Inch Natural Synthetic Straight Hair Middle Part With Air Bang Wigs Dark Root, Party Cosplay Daily Use
reviews.title: Pretty!
reviews.text:
This is a really pretty wig! Looks natural. Not too much shine. Thick enough, but not where it’s heavy. Covers the wig cap well. The color is pretty too.

It’s long so it can get tangled up easily. The picture is of me wearing it right after taking it out and brushing it.

I think this is a great wig if you want something that’s affordable but good quality.

reviews.product_name: MUSE & Co Dazzling Rhinestone Stick On Nails, White Nails with Glitter Nails and Rhinestones "French Sparkle", Luxurious Elegant Nails, Squoval Medium Length Nails Press On Nails for Women and Girls Fake Nail Set 36pcs
reviews.title: Okay...
reviews.text:
I love fake nails, but hate really long ones. So, I liked that these were on the shorter side.

I like the French manicure look. They look beautiful. If you use the alcohol pad, file your nails, and push your cuticles back, these last a decent amount of time. So, in the product photo, the nails with rhinestones are on the thumb, pointing finger, and middle finger. I usually prefer my nails with accents (like rhinestones to either be on the thumb and ring finger or pointer and ring finger, not the first 3).

reviews.product_name: STYLEAGAL Portable Electric Nail Drill, Manicure Pedicure Drill Kit Professional nail starter kit for beginners acrylic with drill（2020 Upgraded）
reviews.title: My First Nail Drill and I Love It!
reviews.text:
It comes with instructions. The one thing I wish is that it had a standard plug, rather than a USB. But, if it had the standard plug, it would have been perfect! Other than that, I have no complaints!

The ease of use and compact size make this perfect for a beginner like me!

EDIT: There’s no switch or anything to remove the different heads. So I wish there was some kind of switch to make it easier to take out the heads.

reviews.product_name: Untangled Fine Tooth Pin Tail Parting Comb - For Difficult Styling and Hair Extensions
reviews.title: Great Quality!
reviews.text: Love this comb! The tail end of the comb works great to section hair. The teeth of the comb are spaced evenly apart. It feels sturdy.

reviews.product_name: 20pcs Nail Tips Clips for Quick Building Polygel Nail Forms Nail Tips Clip for Finger Nail Extension DIY Manicure Nail Art Tool
reviews.title: Great Clips!
reviews.text: These are great! You get 20 for $7.99 (at the time of writing this review) which I think is a great deal! They are easy to open and close but clamp tightly onto the finger. They are so helpful when doing poly gel nails! They keep the mold in place, keeping it flat against the nail bed without any bubbling, giving me a smooth poly gel nail! I’m so glad I got these! If you like doing poly gel nails, these are a great help!

reviews.product_name: MD Complete Bright & Healthy Vitamin C+ Vitalizing Face Serum| with Vitamin C, Vitamin E and Herbal Extracts | Potent Antioxidant Protection, Nourishes, Brightens and Evens Skin 0.5 fl oz
reviews.title: STRONG Smell, Couldn’t Get Past The Smell to Really Use It Other Than a Drop on My Hand
reviews.text:
Once I opened the amazon shipping package, there was a box inside. I couldn’t understand why the scent was so strong if the bottle was intact. The scent of the packaging had such a strong medicine kind of pepper smell, it was really overpowering.

Inside the box, there’s a product info card. The bottle seems nice and durable. The scent was so strong, it made me a little sick to my stomach. I’m not usually sensitive to smells, so it must have just been this specific scent - it had a medicinal, pepper type smell.

reviews.product_name: MAD | Cosmetic's Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes, Daily cleansing face wipes to remove waterproof mascara, alcohol free , with Vitamin E 25 count
reviews.title: Bad Smell, Don’t Wipe Off Makeup Easily
reviews.text: They come in a nice little disposable pack. Theres a plastic area where the top opens and closes. The opening for the wipes wasn’t big enough. It had the little plastic opening with the split in the middle, and it was just TINY! However, they have a weird smell - like cardboard? I do a lot of makeup swatches of eyeshadow palettes and things like that. So, I constantly am using makeup wipes to wipe the swatches off of my arms.

reviews.product_name: COSMOCOS FromNature Perfect Cover BB Cream - Light Beighe/Natural Beige SPF 50+ / PA+++ Sun Protection, Natural Skin Tone, High Coverage Korean Cosmetic K Beauty - 50g (1.76 fl oz) (Light Beige)
reviews.title: Provides Great Coverage. Feels Nice On Skin & Looks Smooth!
reviews.text: I usually like pumps with my foundations. Then I compared it to a swatch of L’Oréal Infallible Pro Glow in 201 Classic Ivory and Maybelline 24 Hr Foundation in 102 Fair Porcelain (I tried to use foundations most people might have tried). As you can see, both are lighter than this BB Blemish Cream. The Maybelline is MUCH lighter. On the product info page it said, “BB Cream Tinted Moisturizer Blemish Balm lets you perfectly blend & build tones from sheer to medium coverage.” Most BB creams I’ve tried are usually sheer to light, not able to go up to medium coverage. I like the squeeze tube.

reviews.product_name: MOSTORY Glitter Crystal Liquid Eyeshadow Set - 4 Pack Pigmented Liquid Eye shadows Matte Shimmer Metallic Quick Dry Crease Resistant Long Lasting Flake-Proof Blendable Non-Greasy Eye Makeup (4 Pack)
reviews.title: Gorgeous!! Such A Great Set!
reviews.text:
These are short tubes, so the applicator is short. The shade number and name are on a sticker on the bottom of the tube.

You get 4
- 001 Mauve Plum - Mauve liquid shadow with silver glitter.
- 002 Rosy Gold - Rose gold liquid shadow with silver glitter.
- 003 Silver Flash - White liquid shadow with silver glitter
- 004 Sparkle Midnight - Black liquid shadow with silver glitter.

They all look so beautiful.

reviews.product_name: TOUCH IN SOL Best of No Pore Blem Travel Kit - Face Makeup Primer, Big Pores Perfect Cover, Inner-Glowing Skin with Moisture, Long Lasting Makeup's Staying Kit
reviews.title: Great Set! Good Way To Try Touch In Sol Primers!
reviews.text:
I had tried the no poreblem primer before when I got it in a boxy charm. They worked way better for my dry skin than the no poreblem primer did. The no poreblem primer feels too silicone for me. The priming essence and priming water both feel so light but hydrating and my makeup looks so much better when I use one of them!

If you’ve been wanting to try Touch In Sol primers, this is a great way to try some of them!

reviews.product_name: EASYDEW Starter Soft Conditioning Face Wash 6.76 fl oz - Soothing and Moisturizing Face Wash with Ceramides, Hydrogen Water & DW-EGF I Deep Pore Cleanser & Hypoallergenic Gentle Makeup Remover
reviews.title: Extremely Gentle! Very Hydrating!
reviews.text:
This comes in a product box. The bottle is a pump bottle. The product itself is white, a medium consistency cream feel.

It’s very gentle. This is something I’d use in my double cleanse - I use a makeup removing oil to remove my makeup, rinse that off, and then use this cleanser. But, I already always double cleanse anyways, and I like how gentle this is so I’m not overly stripping my face.

This is such a nice, gentle cleanser. After using this, my face doesn’t feel that way.

reviews.product_name: LUXAZA 6 PCS Purple Eyeshadow Stick,Light Shimmer Cream Eyeshadow Crayon,Pro Smoky Waterproof & Long Lasting Eyeshadow Stick Set
reviews.title: Feel Soft and Creamy! Not too Pigmented But Do Build Up Well!
reviews.text:
These come in an outer product box that is sealed in clear plastic wrapping. Once you remove the plastic wrapping, the product box has an open window in the front where you can see the eyeshadow shadow sticks (see photos). It also has the cruelty free bunny logo. (See photos)

The eyeshadow sticks are all in black tubes. There’s black lids on one end and a clear lid on the other end. Most are shimmers. 2 of them have glitter particles in them (“Mermaid Teardrop” and “Purple Sunset”). They are smooth and creamy.

reviews.product_name: UV LED Nail Lamp – 128W Rapid-Curing Gel Nails Dryer for Manicures and Pedicures – Dual-Voltage with Extra-Long Cable, Multi-Language Manual – Professional Gel Lamp for Homes or Salons by OVLUX, Gold
reviews.title: Works Great! Dries Nails Fast!
reviews.text:
It’s 128 watt! So it has great power! It has a digital display. The plug is a standard prong plug, which I love! So many products have USB plugs nowadays. I always appreciate when a product has a standard plug!

The shiny gold appearance of it is a little gaudy for my taste. But, I hadn’t seen an at home nail lamp with this high of wattage before, so I was willing to have the shiny gold if I got the high wattage. I think you get a great lamp, that works great with such a high wattage.

reviews.product_name: Pine Gel Nail Polish Set Chameleon Shimmering Color and Black 7.5 ml LED UV Cured Soak Off Nail Gel for Nail Art Manicure
reviews.title: Beautiful Glitters!
reviews.text: There’s an instruction booklet inside. This is ONLY colored polishes. Theres 6 polishes in total. On the product page the first photo shows a dark teal glitter, a dark blue glitter, a dark green glitter, a dark purple glitter, a blue glitter and then the solid black.

reviews.product_name: Pippa Of London Magic Star Eyeshadow Powder Pencil, Long Lasting, Blendable Eye Make Up Stick
reviews.title: Not Creamy, Not Pigmented...
reviews.text:
This comes in a cute outer product box. Inside, the pencil is wrapped in plastic.

The pencil is a standard jumbo kind of pencil and has a clear lid. It says, “Use your makeup highlighter pencil as a creamy, velvety eyeshadow, eyeliner, and highlighter. Apply it to your inner corners and entire eyelid for a pop of intense colour.” This pencil wasn’t creamy or velvety. It could be because I got a shimmer Pearl shade. The pencil should perform as described no matter what color you get.

reviews.product_name: SAISZE Jaw Exerciser, Facial Fat Burner Double Chin Reducer Eliminator for Jawline Shaper, Neck Muscle Training Helps Face Slimming for Men Women (Blue)
reviews.title: Way Too Big For Me to Use
reviews.text: I’m an adult female, but this is way too big for me to use. I’ve always had a small mouth, it’s even been an issue for my teeth. My teeth were crowded and my dentist always said it’s because my mouth was too small for the normal amount of teeth. I didn’t think about the fact that my mouth might be too small to use this. So, unfortunately I wasn’t able to actually use this since it was just too darn big! It seems like it is a standard jar exerciser. It seems durable. Just unfortunately couldn’t work for me.

reviews.product_name: CONBOLA Make Up Organizer 5 in 1 Dresser Organizer,Portable for Lipstick and Jewlry ,Makeup Organizer and Temporary Makeup Brush Holder,Multi-purpose for Girl Women.36.6cm18cm.(Blue)
reviews.title: It’s Okay, But Not For Me...
reviews.text: The one with the lines you can lay brushes in the grooves like shown in the photos on the product page. There’s 11 small ones and 8 big ones. One little bump and the mirror falls over. The dust collects on them like crazy. And I try to just wipe off the dust with a dry cloth but the silicone is rubbery and the dust just kind of sticks to it.

reviews.product_name: NAILGIL Poly Nail Gel (Temperature)
reviews.title: Great Starter Set!
reviews.text: There’s a nice sized pink nail file. There’s a dual headed tool - one end has the flat metal side to apply the poly gel. There’s a bottle of base coat and a bottle of top coat. The product info page says, “you can use alcohol ,cleanser or base coat to instead, They act the same effect. It will make it easier to make gel smoothly. 🤷‍♀️) or base coat as a slip solution. There’s a good assortment of colors. The poly gels work well.

reviews.product_name: CARLA Lacto Biome Balancing Cream Skin Care for Sensitive Dry Skin Face Hydrating Moisturizer
reviews.title: Small Jar, But Very Moisturizing!
reviews.text:
This comes in an outer product box. It has a nice appearance. There’s a plastic safety seal, which I always like. The cream is white. It has a thick consistency, but just glides onto the skin and melts into the skin. My skin feels nice and soft. A little goes a long way, which is good since the jar is so small!

I haven’t noticed any help with brightening or anything, but I am hopeful! So far, I definitely recommend this if price isn’t a factor!

reviews.product_name: Easydew EX Repair Control Renewal Moisture 1.70 fl.oz.
reviews.title: So far so good...
reviews.text: The EGF is at the bottom of the ingredient list so there isn’t a lot in it, which I’m okay with. It’s my first product with EGF in it and I read that EGF can be harsh on the skin. I don’t have sensitive skin but did get slightly red when using this. I’ve been using it every other night. It moisturizes my face well. I haven’t noticed any other benefits so far. If you’re looking for something with a high amount of EGF, this isn’t for you since it’s so far down on the ingredient list.

reviews.product_name: C'est Moi Vanilla Vibes Sugar Balm Body Scrub | Invigorating & Hydrating Exfoliant, Clinically Tested Non-Toxic Ingredients feat. Organic Shea Butter, Coconut Oil & Avocado Oil, EWG Verified, 6 oz
reviews.title: Thought this was amazing, but now only like it..read UPDATE at bottom of review
reviews.text:
I’d been using the Sol De Janeiro Bum Bum Body Scrub. Well, the Bum Bum Body Scrub isn’t like that! THIS SCRUB CHECKS ALL THOSE BOXES!

It’s way more affordable than the Bum Bum scrub. It comes in a jar, so you have to screw the top off, similar to the Bum Bum scrub. But, a lot easier. It smells amazing, like vanilla. The BEST part....this is a “Sugar Balm Body Scrub.” The balm makes it kind of like a thicker, kind of paste. I felt gunk go under my nails.

reviews.product_name: LXIANGN Nail Glass Cup With Lid Cute Dappen Dishes 2PCS Heart Shaped Bowl Glass Mini Crystal Bowls for Nail Art Manicure Care Tools
reviews.title: Very cute, little dishes that can be used as dappen dishes or for other things!
reviews.text: Second, the glass has a rainbow look to it. These are meant to be dappen dishes, so they are supposed to be used for liquids you’d use when doing your nails, such as slip solution, polish, etc. I’m not sure why they don’t have the rainbow look like the bottom, but it doesn’t look bad with the clear lids. I previously saw dappen dishes I wanted, but they had these huge lids that just kind of sat on top of the dishes, so I didn’t get them. The glass is thick and durable. They look beautiful.

reviews.product_name: BQAN 2 Pieces Wax Pencil for Rhinestones, Dual-ended Rhinestone Picker Dotting Tool, Wax Pen for DIY Nail Art, Rhinestone Gems Crystals Studs Picker With Pink Acrylic Handle (Pink & Pink)
reviews.title: Exactly what I needed to make picking up rhinestones/gems/sequins/etc. easy!
reviews.text: They’re comfortable in the hand. You have the wax tip that picks up rhinestones/gems or any other nail art like sequins or charms. Then there is a stainless steel tip that you use to press down the rhinestone/gem/etc. You can also pick up a little rhinestone glue with the stainless steel tip and use it to apply a small dot of glue to where you want it on the nail. It’s totally worth it to help with the ease of application and save you time and frustration trying to use something else.

reviews.product_name: Eyebrow Stamp and Eyebrow Shaper Kit,One Step Brow Stamp Shaping Kit - Professional Eyebrow Powder Stamp Makeup with 24 Eyebrow Stencils 4 Eyebrow Makeup Brushes
reviews.title: Powder gives light wash of color. Good for someone who doesn’t need too much.
reviews.text: The only thing I wished was that the eyebrow stamp was a little thinner. Unlike most kits that have brow stencils like these, these have adhesive backing that sticks to you. Most kits I’ve gotten like these the stencils are plastic, so reusable. Once you use the spoolie, it looks pretty natural. I usually do a little tinted brow gel. Then, I’ll take a brow pencil and do a few kind of hair like strokes in the front. It is a nice way to try different brow shapes to see what you like for yourself. The brow powder looks natural and lasts nicely in the brows.

reviews.product_name: YERMA Makeup Face Primer with Brush - Instant Brightening and Whitening, Minimize Pores and Fine Lines, Natural Ingredients Moisturizing Primer for All Skin Types, Illuminate and smooth skin surface
reviews.title: Fills in fine lines and pores giving a smooth base for foundation
reviews.text: This is interesting! A while ago I watched a video from a well known makeup artist. A lot of times just having a layer over them works. It creates a smooth layer to put your base on. But, throughout the day the layer kind of breaks down and you end up with your pores showing. It isn’t rough or scratchy. It fills in fine lines and pores. And foundation goes over it great!

reviews.product_name: O.M.CHIC Mannequin Head with shoulders for wig, Display wigs Eyeglasses Necklaces and Earrings
reviews.title: Stunning!
reviews.text:
It comes in an outer product box. It even had a little styrofoam kind of eye mask protecting the eyes! She has makeup and beautiful eyes with lashes! There’s a kind of wig cap on top of the head that seems to be glued on.

It doesn’t state the size of the head or how tall the mannequin is. The head seems to fit standard wigs (22-22.5”). There is a photo that shows a measuring tape around the head. 54 cm is 21 inches, which seems about right. You can use it for wigs and jewelry.

reviews.product_name: UNNY CLUB Cover Glow Cushion 0.3 Oz / 11g Beige Color SPF50+, Flawless Gloss Cushion Powder Complex Single Layer Concealer Cover Moisture Essence Tight Fit, Korea Cosmetics (No.23 Natural Beige)
reviews.title: Nice glowy finish with good coverage. Contains chemical sunscreen ingredients
reviews.text:
If you don’t mind the chemical sunscreen ingredients, and like cushion foundations and a dewy finish, I think you’ll really like this!

INGREDIENTS FROM PRODUCT PAGE:
Water,Titanium Dioxide,Butylene Glycol,Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Cyclohexasiloxane, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Niacinamide, Octocrylene, Zinc Oxide, PEG-30 Dipolyhydroxystearate, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Glycerin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Acrylates/Stearyl Acrylate/Dimethicone Methacrylate Copolymer, Sodium Chloride, Isododecane, Caprylic/Capric Glycerides,Acrylates/Polytrimethylsiloxymethacrylate Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Paraffin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Aluminum Hydroxide, Microcrystalline Wax, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Adenosine, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Propolis Extract, Squalane, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Amethyst Powder, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract, Tourmaline, 1,2-Hexanediol, Nephrite Powder, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Leaf Extract, Pearl Powder, Ruby Powder, Coral Powder, Alcohol, Leontopodium Alpinum Extract, Pearl Extract, Amber Powder, Phoenix Dactylifera (Date) Seed, Ascorbic Acid, Honey Extract, Sodium Metabisulfite, Sodium Sulfite, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dunaliella Salina Extract, Madecassoside, Parfum, Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77499)

reviews.product_name: UNNY CLUB Cover Glow Cushion 0.3 Oz / 11g Beige Color SPF50+, Flawless Gloss Cushion Powder Complex Single Layer Concealer Cover Moisture Essence Tight Fit, Korea Cosmetics (No.21 Light Beige)
reviews.title: Nice glowy finish with good coverage. Contains chemical sunscreen ingredients.
reviews.text:
If you don’t mind the chemical sunscreen ingredients, and like cushion foundations and a dewy finish, I think you’ll really like this!

INGREDIENTS FROM PRODUCT PAGE:
Water,Titanium Dioxide,Butylene Glycol,Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Cyclohexasiloxane, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Niacinamide, Octocrylene, Zinc Oxide, PEG-30 Dipolyhydroxystearate, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Glycerin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Acrylates/Stearyl Acrylate/Dimethicone Methacrylate Copolymer, Sodium Chloride, Isododecane, Caprylic/Capric Glycerides,Acrylates/Polytrimethylsiloxymethacrylate Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Paraffin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Aluminum Hydroxide, Microcrystalline Wax, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Adenosine, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Propolis Extract, Squalane, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Amethyst Powder, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract, Tourmaline, 1,2-Hexanediol, Nephrite Powder, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Leaf Extract, Pearl Powder, Ruby Powder, Coral Powder, Alcohol, Leontopodium Alpinum Extract, Pearl Extract, Amber Powder, Phoenix Dactylifera (Date) Seed, Ascorbic Acid, Honey Extract, Sodium Metabisulfite, Sodium Sulfite, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dunaliella Salina Extract, Madecassoside, Parfum, Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77499)

reviews.product_name: Women Ultra Smooth Razor Womens Razors for Shaving Comfortable handle 5-blade Razor + 2 Refill Blades for a Smooth and safety Shave Reusable Razors for Girls Women
reviews.title: Great razor, but no way to buy just replacement heads (at least not when I’m writing this)
reviews.text: The razor has 5 blades that are stainless steel. It says they’re made of high quality steel in the USA. There’s no replacement heads here on Amazon. Why sell something on here that requires replacement heads but not sell the replacement heads on here? For that you get the razor handle part, ceramic stand, and 2 razor heads. I can get 4 Venus Gillette replacement heads here on Amazon for $10.99. The only downside is the replacement heads. Like I said, hopefully they’ll add the replacement heads onto Amazon soon.

reviews.product_name: LuminaGlow Liquid Dual Eyeliner Waterproof Vegan Black Smudge Proof Cruelty-Free Paraben-Free, 0.02oz Description of the Issue - I need to change the title to be more descriptive.
reviews.title: Works really well, but even getting 2 in 1, it’s pricier than my go-to drugstore liquid liners
reviews.text: The product page says it is cruelty free and vegan, but I didn’t see any kind of certified logo saying it was on the product box. One end has a felt tip and one end has a brush tip. They are a pigmented black, not thin or watery black. I have really small, really hooded eyes, so having a dual ended eyeliner pen is great! My usual one at the drugstore ones are $10 (NYX Epic Wear Liquid Liner) and $8 (Maybelline Curvitude Angled Liquid Liner) and I never have any issues with them.

reviews.product_name: Kopari Bubblegum Lip Gloss Kit | Strawberry, Grape, and Bubble Gum Flavors | Hydrating Blend of Shea Butter and Coconut Oil to Nourish and Soothe Chapped Lips | Vegan and Cruelty-Free
reviews.title: 2 of 3 have micro glitter (mica). Sticky but not too bad. Moisturizing
reviews.text: They are vegan and cruelty free.

reviews.product_name: 35.4 Inch Extra Long Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower, 2021 Updated Lengthen Back Scrubber Brush for Men and Women, Exfoliating Back Washer with Wall Hooks, Easy Clean, Comfortable Massage (Green 27.5in)
reviews.title: Great!
reviews.text: It seems like I've had an itch in the upper and middle part of my back for months now. I basically use my loofah to apply suds to the scrubby side, then it's just a matter of figuring out where to place your hands so that you reach your trouble areas. I did wish that there was some way to make more suds on both sides, like a loofah does, but it works. It came with little hooks that you can stick on to your shower walls/tiles, from which you can hang your loofah, your scrubber and whatever else.

reviews.product_name: Travel Friendly Face Cleanser, Quick Cleansing Dry Tissue 20 Packs - Dry Facial Wipes Makeup Remover Travel Size, Exfoliating Wipes For Face
reviews.title: These Work Great!
reviews.text:
I've only started wearing makeup recently, other than eye liner and mascara. I was using Neutrogena make-up remover wipes to remove the liner and mascara, which are waterproof. The problem I always have with those is the packaging. That is the reason I was interested in these.

They work great! They come in a box, and each towelette is individually wrapped. Immediately, the towelette suds up and all you have to do is wipe your makeup away, even waterproof mascara and eyeliner!

These are excellent wipes and I'm very pleased!

reviews.product_name: Hemp Lotion for Dry Skin - Soothing Rose Flower & Aloe Hydrate Your Complexion - Non-Greasy, Vegan, 7Oz, 250Mg Hemp, Fragrance & Paraben Free - Guayaquil By La La Leaf
reviews.title: A Little Thin, But Still Lovely!
reviews.text: Hemp lotion is becoming a favorite of mine-there are so many out there to choose from. Putting it on fresh out of the shower seems to keep my skin in lovely condition all day long. There is no scent to it, which kind of bums me out. I was expecting a lotion to be a little bit thicker, but since it's still very moisturizing, I deducted only one star for that. Other than those two things, I have no complaints and am considering buying more in the future.

reviews.product_name: MAD | Cosmetic's Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes, Daily cleansing face wipes to remove waterproof mascara, alcohol free , with Vitamin E 25 count
reviews.title: Just Okay
reviews.text:
Since I've started wearing makeup again, I wanted to get some makeup remover wipes, most especially for removing waterproof mascara. When I saw these up for request, I clicked right away.

Unfortunately, I'm not that happy with these. I do like the design of the package-the plastic cover that clicks closed. (Resealable ones I've used in the past don't stay resealed because the adhesive wears off over time.) Trying to get one of the wipes out was difficult, because it doesn't seem like the slit is begin enough to pull them out.

reviews.product_name: Bath Body Brush with Super Comfy Bristles for Universal Skin,Long Bamboo Handle Gentle Exfoliation Improve Skin's Health and Beauty Wet or Dry Brushing Back Scrubber for Shower
reviews.title: Great For Those Hard To Reach Places!
reviews.text:
It's wintertime in New England, which means it's time for dry, dry skin. This review is of: Bath Body Brush with Super Comfy Bristles for Kids Women Sensitive Skin,Long Bamboo Handle Gentle Exfoliation Improve Skin's Health and Beauty Wet or Dry Brushing Back Scrubber for Shower.

This year, I've been having a hard time with dry skin on my upper back. Man oh man, is this brush SOFT! The long bamboo handle makes it possible to reach everywhere you need to. There is a rope?

reviews.product_name: Nail Polish Gel Remover Tools Kit for Women with Nail Clip Caps, Nail File, Nail Remover Cotton Pads,Brush, 2-in-1 Cuticle Scraper and Pusher, Nail Separator
reviews.title: Good Kit, But No Bottle and You Will Need Acetone
reviews.text:
This review is for: Nail Polish Gel Remover Tools Kit for Women with Nail Clip Caps, Nail File, Nail Remover Cotton Pads,Brush, 2-in-one Cuticle Scraper/Pusher.

First things first, I was surprised to come here to write this review and discover that I received no dispenser bottle as listed and pictured in the product description. Note to self, buy another measuring cup! I used tweezers and soaked the little pads in acetone and then wrapped it around my nail and applied the clamp.

reviews.product_name: Got2b Glued Spray Wax with 2-in-1 Dual Nozzle, 8 oz
reviews.title: Works!
reviews.text: The last time I was at the hair salon, my stylist used spray wax on my hair and I was amazed by it. Never having heard of spray wax before and loving the hold that it gave my hair, when I saw this available for request on Vine, I asked for it. I like this better than hair spray because it doesn't make my hair crunchy while still keeping my style. I do sometimes have some flyaways near the end of the day, so I don't know if the hold fades or what exactly is happening, but 9 hours of hold is pretty good.

reviews.product_name: HASK CUCUMBER + ALOE Body Wash 2 Pack- Refreshing, vegan formula, hypoallergenic, dermatologist tested, pH balanced- 2 Pack of 24.5 oz Bottles
reviews.title: Love This Stuff!
reviews.text:
In addition to being a lotion addict, I also have a thing for body washes which is why I requested this from Vine. This review is for: HASK CUCUMBER + ALOE Body Wash 2 Pack- Refreshing, vegan formula, hypoallergenic, dermatologist tested, pH balanced- 2 Pack of 24.5 oz Bottles.

Yesterday was our first hot day of the year and we spent about four hours working outside in the sun. It creates a nice foamy lather, so it works perfectly with a loofah.

reviews.product_name: Spanature Aloe Vera Hand & Body Lotion Travel Size Selection, 4 Pack, Relaxing and Revitalizing Moisturizer for Rough and Dry Skin, Nourishing and Gentle for All Skin Types, Made In Korea - 75 ml/2.53oz
reviews.title: Smells Wonderful, Good Lotion For Dry Skin
reviews.text:
It's nearly summer here in New England, which means lots of time swimming and sunning. As a result, quality lotions are needed. This review is of: Spanature Aloe Vera Hand & Body Lotion Travel Size Selection Made In Korea 75 ml/2.53oz (4pcs)…

As the product information states, this comes as four cute boxes of lotion, great for gift giving. Inside the boxes, all four tubes of lotion do have foil caps, so your safety was considered.

The lotion itself smells light and airy to me, not heavy.

reviews.product_name: 2020 UPGRADED Exfoliating Loofah Sponge Pads, Natural Luffa Material Loofah Pads Shower Body Scruber for Men/Women Bath Spa and Shower (3 Pack)
reviews.title: They are big!
reviews.text: I really wanted to use these on my face. But they are too big for that! Check the measurements. They are great for all over body exfoliating though. They have elastic on the back side to slide your hand under. It's definitely rough enough to get rid of dead skin cells. They are a little stiff. I had to bend it back and forth several times to loosen them up. They seem to be made well.

reviews.product_name: 3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult)
reviews.title: If you're wondering if they work, they do!
reviews.text: Masks are hot. We all know that. They are hard to breathe in. You end up sucking the fabric up in your mouth and can't get it out. These are simple to use. I just place it in my mask and put the mask on my face. It stays put. It holds the mask away from your mouth and nose. They do make you sweat under the plastic. But at least you can breathe easier. You can easily wash these with soap and water. I just lay them out to dry. They fit kids as well.

reviews.product_name: CONBOLA Make Up Organizer 5 in 1 Dresser Organizer,Portable for Lipstick and Jewlry ,Makeup Organizer and Temporary Makeup Brush Holder,Multi-purpose for Girl Women.36.6cm18cm.(Blue)
reviews.title: For traveling or at home.
reviews.text: This makeup organizer has a spot for everything. You can easily lay the mirror flat and put it in your suitcase. The mirror acts as a cover to hold your makeup in the compartments. You can take it all out and use it on your counter at home. The whole thing is about 14 1/4" long and 1" deep. It has foam inserts for your makeup brushes and eyeliners, lipstick or concealer tubes and a wavy type insert for laying your brushes flat as you use them. The bottom has tiny foam pads to keep it from moving around. It can easily be cleaned with soap and water.

reviews.product_name: Aesfee Makeup Mirror Vanity Mirror with Lights, 1x/2x/3x Magnification LED Lighted Trifold Cosmetic Mirrors, 3 Color Lighting Modes Touch Control Dimmable Countertop Illuminated Mirrors - White
reviews.title: It is bright!
reviews.text: I can't say anything bad about the light this mirror provides. It has three light levels. The daylight one can be a little too much. You can definitely see every flaw in your face! I like that you can use this with batteries or USB charged. I have so many other things plugged into my outlets. They have different levels of magnification. Those would be a little better if they were a little larger. The middle mirror is the perfect size though. It's kind of difficult to do my eyebrows without lowering my head down. But it's a nice light and magnification.

reviews.product_name: Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm, Facial Kit with Microneedle and Pink Jade Rollers
reviews.title: Helps your skin absorb moisturizer.
reviews.text: I love the combination of these two rollers. The microneedle roller is great for rolling your face before applying moisturizer. It helps your skin absorb it better. I also use it on my eyebrows. I have very sparse eyebrows. I am applying hair growth serum on them. I roll my eyebrows, apply the serum and then roll it again to help it get better absorbed. I have fine hairs growing back in. I also like the derma roller. I put it in the refrigerator. It feels so good to roll over your forehead and across your eyes. Helps to relieve headaches too. This is a nice duo to add to your daily facial routine.

reviews.product_name: Kneipp Shower Foam Goodbye Stress Water Mint & Rosemary 6.81 Oz
reviews.title: The scent is so good, really practical change from gel to foam.
reviews.text: I really enjoyed this soap. The scent is so good, its so practical change from gel to foam. I guess I used it too much for the first time, I only need 1 pump and spread it with loofah and that's enough for the whole body.

reviews.product_name: WIS Acne Skin Pleiotropic Conditioning Face Mask Acne Scar Remover & zit Treatment & Blemish Fightting & Reduce Pores | Organic Mask Care Acne Prone skin-24 Pcs
reviews.title: Moisturizing yet powerful ingredients for acne prone skin.
reviews.text: So far, it doesn't make me breakout.

reviews.product_name: NeoCell Overnighter Collagen, 9.3oz
reviews.title: One hour before bedtime ritual drink.
reviews.text: I have been taking this for 2 weeks nightly now and I can tell the difference in my skin and hair feeling softer. I have sores on my arm and they have been healing faster.My skin feel smoother and less breakouts and my fingernails are starting to lose the ridges on them and look so much stronger. For the restful sleep benefit, I didn't feel any difference as I don't have sleep problem.

reviews.product_name: Plant Therapy Natural Acetone Free Nail Polish Remover 6 fl oz One Touch Dispensing Bottle with Flip Top Cap Tropical Flower Scent
reviews.title: Smell less chemical and the polish easy to remove.
reviews.text: Smell less chemical and the polish easy to remove.

reviews.product_name: Shakira Perfumes - Dance for Women - Long Lasting - Femenine, Charming and Modern Perfume - Fruity Floral Notes - Ideal for Day Wear - 1.7 Fl Oz
reviews.title: Smells good and long lasting.
reviews.text: Smells sweet and divine...sexy scents, and long lasting.

reviews.product_name: TINY BUDDHA Mindfulness Gift Set Includes Soothing Bath and Shower Gel, Relaxing Pillow Spray, Calming Essential Oil Roll-On, Lychee Flower Scented Candle and Daily Mindfulness Practice Guide
reviews.title: Love all this set.
reviews.text: Awesome for relaxing, fell sleep faster.

reviews.product_name: Sand & Sky Face Roller & Massager Tool. Aussie Skincare Essentials Firming Face Roller, Sculpt, Sooth & Contour to Banish Puffiness and Boost Serum Absorption.
reviews.title: Smooth roller, cooling and soothing the skin.
reviews.text: Smooth roller, cooling and soothing the skin.

reviews.product_name: Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm, Facial Kit with Microneedle and Pink Jade Rollers
reviews.title: My client loves hers!
reviews.text: I got this as a gift for an older client of mine. She spent a lot of money on a plastic set last year, and she loves rose quartz, so when I saw this I knew she’d love it. And she does! She says the smoothing coolness of the rose quartz feels amazing on her neck. And it’s pretty to look at!

reviews.product_name: Beauhair Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Pre Plucked Brazilian Deep Wave 13x4 Lace Frontal Wig with Baby Hair 9A Natural Hair Wigs for Black Women(16, Deep Wigs)
reviews.title: Bad quality- short hair except for the back
reviews.text: So disappointed in this unit and I feel like it’s a waste of real human hair. As it came the curls are super tight and when worn looks like some 80s Gerry curl type thing. So I took my flat iron out and straightened it out at 350 degrees. I’m ok with it being wavy, but as I straightened it all the tiny broken  filler hairs on top of the unit became extremely obvious. Ugh. While it looked better wavy, it’s still a hot mess. The hairline part and cap fit funny. Like the hairline goes past the ears. The side combs are near the nape comb.

reviews.product_name: QTMY Crystal Gemstone Headbands Baroque Hair Accessories Head Band Fashion Headwear Hairbands for Women,Pink
reviews.title: Pretty!
reviews.text: Pretty headband, has a very princess feel to it. Fit my adult 22 inch head fine. My only issue is that on the end the stones weren’t glued down all the way. Otherwise beautiful piece!

reviews.product_name: Long Black Wavy Wig with Bangs for Women Synthetic Wigs Natural Looking Realistic Wigs Hair for Daily Party Cosplay Use
reviews.title: Not bad for $20
reviews.text: One of the better $20 and under wigs on amazon. Not for daily use, the scalp isn’t legit enough for that, but great for cosplay, bedroom or with a hat. The hair is soft and not overly shiny. Doesn’t look the best on me but it’s a nicer quality unit at the price point.

reviews.product_name: Easydew EX Repair Control Renewal Moisture 1.70 fl.oz.
reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.text: Yet another Korean beauty product that has failed to disappoint me! I have combo skin that gets really dry but also breaks out easily. Finding a good moisturizer for my face can be tough. But not since I discovered the magic of Korean products. The hype is real, and this is no exception. I use it at night before bed. A little amount smooths on nicely, making my face feel instantly moisturized without feeling greasy or heavy. Since using it I haven’t felt any tightness in my skin. It has a nice clean soap like fresh scent to it.

reviews.product_name: Argan Magic Color Protection Hair Mask – Nourishes, Hydrates & Helps to Protect Color Treated Hair | Enriched with Moringa Oil & Botanical Extracts | Made in USA | Paraben Free | Cruelty Free (8 oz)
reviews.title: Nothing special
reviews.text: It’s an ok hair conditioner. Typical drug store quality. My hair usually responds very well to *quality* argan oil. But this left my hair still feeling dry and looking frizzy. I had to liberally apply some smoothing leave in after, twice. But work well for fine hair, but I have thick, course hair and this was just disappointing.

reviews.product_name: NOBLE Wigs for White Women Purple Lace Wigs for Black Women 27 Inch Long Curly Wavy Colored Wigs Middle Part Heat Resistant Synthetic Ombre Purple Wavy Wigs for Daily Party Cosplay Use
reviews.title: SO PRETTY!
reviews.text: I wish so badly I could give this unit 5 stars. The colors are GORGEOUS. Fun and pretty and can go casual, party, club, bedroom, cosplay etc. the hair itself is very soft and silky with beautiful waves. The lace part is deep and looks so natural. There’s a comb at the nape. The nape comb ends up about halfway down the back of my head, the cap is too small. SUCH A BUMMER. If noble could just make their caps a little bigger I’d be so happy because they have some of the best quality wigs. My head is normal size so it’s not asking much!

reviews.product_name: Argan Magic 100% Pure Argan Oil – Moisturizing Oil that Infuses Skin with Enriched Hydration | Leaves Skin Restored & Refreshed | Non-Greasy | Rich in Vitamin E | Made in USA | Cruelty Free (2 oz)
reviews.title: Good argan oil
reviews.text:
This is the same as a very well known name brand pure argan oil I usually buy, I compared them side by side and couldn't tell a difference.

Personally I don't like it on my skin, I find it leaves a shine and kind of greasy residue but I do love it in my curly hair, it really provides a lot of moisture to my thirsty locks.

reviews.product_name: Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Conditioner to Grow, Thicken, Moisturize and Protect Your Beard, 8.5 oz.
reviews.title: Very drying
reviews.text: My husband found this to be very drying and he didn't like it at all for that reason. It has a light minty scent to it which was fine but it just dried on his beard and left it easily tangled.

reviews.product_name: Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Shampoo with Natural Essential Oils for Moisturizing Skin & Hair, 8.5 oz.
reviews.title: Cleans fine, light scent
reviews.text: My husband said this shampoo worked fine, it lathered and cleaned his beard just fine. It just didn't feel moisturizing at all. A good shampoo can leave your hair moisturized and this one left it clean but dry and easily tangled.

reviews.product_name: Study Buddy Clay Mask with Detoxifying Bentonite, 3 fl. oz., Exfoliates, Brightens and Clears Pores, Clay Draws Out Impurities and Improves Skin's Texture and Tone by Higher Education Skincare
reviews.title: The gentle warming is SO relaxing
reviews.text: I love the gentle warming effect of this mask! it feels great on and the warming seemed to reactivate for me so after rinsing it off my skin felt warm for a little while afterwards, which I loved! This mask left my skin feeling nicely moisturized and not tight which I prefer. I didn't need a lot for application and it dried nicely then came rinsed off as expected for a clay mask. It is easier to wash off in the shower or with a washcloth at the sink.

reviews.product_name: GENSKIN Generation Skin Hydrating Marine Algae Eye Patches | Hydrate, Plump, Brighten Eye Area 180g/6.34 Oz - 30 pairs
reviews.title: Didn't see any results
reviews.text:
I used these for 20 minutes and saw absolutely no change to the skin around my eyes. The weather is very dry where I live right now so I get extra fine lines from the dryness that will easily disappear with a good moisturizing mask or eye patch and these patches did not get the job done. I have other eye patches that are much cheaper that work great (I wont even say work better since these didnt work at all).

At any price, but especially at the currently listed $50, these are a hard pass for me.

reviews.product_name: WIS Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizing Facial Mask for Women Anti-aging, Deep Hydrating, Remove Wrinkles, 24 Pack Sheet Mask for Dry and Sensitive Skin Care
reviews.title: Absorb fulling without tacky feeling
reviews.text: I really like these masks, the serum absorbed fully into my skin very quickly without leaving any kind of tacky residue behind like I have experienced with so many other sheet masks. It moisturized my skin great and all the tiny fine lines from dryness were gone.
